GK16visa03cu:0: tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ atha ko 'yaṃ rasa ityucyate--
GK16visa03cu:7: atha--kāvyasvarūpanirūpaṇānantaraṃ koyaṃ raso yadātmakaṃ vākyaṃ kāvyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:16: tasya pṛthagupādānaṃ ca govṛṣanyāyāt prāśastyārtham, praśastyaṃ ca ratyādeḥ śīghrapratipādakatvāt
GK16visa03cu:17: yadyapi vibhāvāditrayasya militasyaiva rasahetutā vakṣyate, tathāpi yatra śloke militā na santi tatraikenānyavyañjane vyabhicāriṇāmanyāpekṣayā śīghravyañjakatvabhityetaddvārā rasasyāpi śīghrapratipādakatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:24: tadvyañjanāvaśādeva rasāderasaṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyaparibhāṣā, tataśca bhāvanopanītaḥ sa ratyādirvibhāvādiniṣṭhena svādanākhyavyāpāreṇa sāmājikaratyādyabhedenāropyamāṇaḥ svaprakāśānandatayā tathā pariṇamatīti
GK16visa03cu:33: yadyapīha milito ratyādiḥ prapānakarasanyāyena carvyamāṇo 'khaṇḍasvarūpo rasaḥ, tathāpi lokaprasiddhimāsādya pratyabhijñānāt
GK16visa03cu:48: ānīya nītaḥ svādyatvaṃ sthāyibhāvo rasaḥ smṛtaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:53: (vi, gha) nanu sāttvikabhāvo 'pi rasādivyañjakaḥ, sa kathaṃ nokta
GK16visa03cu:60: vyakto dadhyādinyāyena rūpāntarapariṇato vyaktīkṛta eva raso na tu dīpena ghaṭa iva pūrvasiddho vyajyate /
GK16visa03cu:65: tannyāyena rāmādiratyādireva vibhāvādiniṣṭhakhādanākhyavyāpāreṇa sāmājikaratyādau abhedenāropyamāṇaḥ svaprakāśānandatmakajñānarūpatayā pariṇamatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:66: vyakta ityasyārthaṃ pariṇata ityantena darśayitvā, tādṛgavastha eva rasaḥ, natu atādṛgavastha iti pratipādayan punarāha---vyakto vyaktīkṛta eveti /
GK16visa03cu:67: idaṃ ca vyaktīkṛtarasāsvādākhyena vyāpāreṇa vibhāvādiniṣṭhena vyañjanābhinnavyāpārāntareṇa rāmādiratyādyāropaviṣayasāmājikaratyādeḥ svaprakāśānandarūpatayā viṣayīkaraṇamityagre vyaktirbhaviṣyati Locanā:
GK16visa03cu:68: (lo, u) dadhyādīti---yathā dugdhaṃ dadhirūpeṇa pariṇamate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:71: “rasāḥ pratīyanta iti tvodanaṃ pacatītivad vyavahāraḥ” iti /
GK16visa03cu:80: (lo, ū) odanaṃ pacatītivat--na khalvodanaḥ pūrvasiddho vyajyate,
GK16visa03cu:81: kintu pakvaḥ san odano bhavatīti tathāyamapi vyaktaḥ san raso bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:83: atra ca ratyādipadopādānādeva prāpte sathāyitve punaḥ sthāyipadopādānaṃ ratyādīnāmapi rasāntaraṣvasthāyitvapratipādanārtham
GK16visa03cu:89: (vi, cha) rasatāmeti ratyādiḥ sthāyībhāvaḥ sacetasām”iti yaduktaṃ tatra sthāyītyasya upādānaphalamāha--atra ratyādīti /
GK16visa03cu:94: paraṃ kevalaṃ tādṛśo hāsakrodhādibhāvaḥ sthāyitāṃ pratipadyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:105: (vi, ja) sattvodrekāditi kārikārthaṃ pratipadaṃ svayameva vyākhyāsyati /
GK16visa03cu:107: svākāravadabhinnatveneti---ayaṃ ratyādijñānarūpo rasaḥ pariṇāmavaśādratyādyabhinnatvena viśiṣṭa āsvādyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:109: āropyamāṇarāmādiratyādyabhedana adhikaraṇībhūtasāmājikaratyādereva yaḥ svaprakāśa āsvādaḥ tasyeva rasatvāt tatra cābhinnatvābhāvāt /
GK16visa03cu:111: svākāravāde hi viṣayo jñānābhinno jñānasyākāra eveti /
GK16visa03cu:113: (lo, ṝ) samprati kīdṛgasāvāsādyate yenaitadāsvādanalampaṭaḥ kāvye pravartiṣyate lokaḥ ityāśaṅkyoktāṃ sattvodrekāditi kārikāmavatārayati--asyeti /
GK16visa03cu:121: “rajastamobhyāmaspṛṣṭaṃ manaḥ satvamihocyate” ityuktaprakāro bāhyameyavimukhatāpādakaḥ kaścanāntaro dharmaḥ sattvam /
GK16visa03cu:124: akhaṇḍa ityeka evāyaṃ vibhāvādiratyādiprakāśasukhacamatkārātmakaḥ atra hetuṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:132: nanu kathamevaṃvidhaḥ sattvodreko jāyate, tataśca kathamakhaṇḍasvaprakāśānandād bodhaḥ ityāśaṅkyāha--tatra ceti /
GK16visa03cu:133: ayamāśayaḥ-”sattvaṃ sukhe sañjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata /
GK16visa03cu:135: ityādi bhagavadvacanāt triguṇātmake manasi sattvāṃśasya prakāśe sukhetpattiḥ sattvāṃśasya prakāśaśca rajastamasorabhibhavād vaiṣayikaṃ sukhaṃ janayati /
GK16visa03cu:136: tathā hi sattvāṃśaprakāśatāratamyād vaiṣayikasukhasyāpi tāratamyaṃ dṛśyate /
GK16visa03cu:138: tacca sukhakāraṇaṃ yadi sakalalaukikasukhakāraṇottaraṃ tena rajastamasorabhibhavaḥ sarvathā śakyakriya eveti /
GK16visa03cu:139: tato nyāyāt lokottarakāvyārthaśravaṇarūpakāraṇāt sarvathā rajastamasyabhibhūya manasaḥ sattvāṃśasyaiva prakāśastadā tanmātrahetuko
GK16visa03cu:143: sa cātmānandād bodho yadi”anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ nirasya prāṇato yataḥ
GK16visa03cu:145: śāstrānayanahetukaḥ syāt tadā nirupahitaṃ brahma prakāśate /
GK16visa03cu:152: ratyādyaṃśaśavalatvādeva cāsya brahmāsvādasya sahodaratvaṃ; natu tattvaṃ sūtreṇoktam /
GK16visa03cu:153: svarūpārtha ityanena mayaṭaḥ prastutārthasya nirāsaḥ, tena svaprakāśānandacidabhinnatvaṃ rasasyoktaṃ bhavati /
GK16visa03cu:164: vibhāvādiśca ratyādiśca tadviṣayaṃ yat svaprakāśarūpaṃ sukhaṃ tatsahitaḥ camatkāra ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:166: tādṛśasukhacamatkārayorekadā sthitau tatra hetuṃ vakṣyāmaḥ “vyāpārosti vibhāvādeḥ”ityādinā
GK16visa03cu:167: vibhāvādeḥ svādanākhyavyāpārasya camatkārahetutāyāḥ sāmājikānāṃ rāmādināyakābhedāropahetutāyāśca vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:168: cinmaya itīti---svaprakāśānanda eva cid jñānaṃ tat svarūpa ityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:171: cittasya vistāraḥ ātmasaṃyogaviśeṣeṇa janitaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ jñānam /
GK16visa03cu:182: (vi, ña) rase sāra iti rasāsvādahetutvāt sāraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:186: tasmin sati śṛṅgārādirasakāvyeṣvapi adbhuto rasaḥ sambhavati /
GK16visa03cu:189: kāvyaprakāśe tu āsvāda eva camatkāraḥ natu tadbhinno vismayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:205: “na jāyate tadāsvādo vinā ratyādivāsanām'; iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:213: yathā yoginaḥ śuddhaṃ brahma svaprakāśānandacidrūpatayā sākṣātkurvanti ratyādyaṃśakarburitamapi tathā puṇyavanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:222: ācāryāstu śavalitasyaivānubhavāt sukhamanubhavāmīti pratisandhānasya ca tāvatavopapatteradhikaṃ necchanti /
GK16visa03cu:234: vastutastu saṃbhedāditi lyab--garbhatvāt pañcamī tena vibhāvādiśavalita iti /
GK16visa03cu:235: ātmānandeti---ātmani ya ānandastadrūpeṇa samudbhavo yasya tādṛśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:239: tatsambhedāditi lyablope paccamī tena vibhāvādiśavalita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:241: tathāpi “rasaḥ svādyate” iti kālpanikaṃ bhedamurarī kṛtya karmakarttari vā
GK16visa03cu:246: karmakartari veti--”bhidyate kuśūlaḥ svayameva”ityatra ekasyaiva kuśūlasya karmatvakarttṛtvobhayavivakṣayā bhedāropavadatrāpi āsvādyāsvādanayorabhedepi bhedavivakṣayā karmakartari prayogaḥ ityarthaḥ naca āsvādye āsvādasya viṣayitāeva, tatkathaṃ kartṛtvamiti vācyam,
GK16visa03cu:249: taduktam-”rasyamānatāmātrasāratvāt prakāśaśarīrādananya eva hi rasaḥ” iti
GK16visa03cu:282: nanvetāvatā kimaniṣṭamityato vibhāvādervyañjakatvānupapattyā rasasya vyaṅgyatvānupapattiḥ evāniṣṭamitivaktuṃ prathamaṃ vibhāvādervyañjakatvānupapattiṃ ghaṭavyañjakadīpavailakṣaṇyena
GK16visa03cu:284: ghaṭādervyañjako yathā dīpo vibhāvādestathātvābhāvād ghaṭavyañjakadīpato vibhāvādeḥ pārthakyaṃ pṛthagbhāvo vailakṣaṇyamiti samudāyārthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:285: yathāśrutākṣarārthena tvayamartho na ghaṭate, svaviṣayajñānena svajanyajñānena vā ghaṭadhiyo hetordepasya ghaṭavyañjakabhāvaprasaktyā
GK16visa03cu:290: tathā ca svajanyajñānābhinnāyā anyasya jñānadanyasya dhiyo heturyaḥ sa eva siddhe jñānaṃ vināpi siddhe arthe vyañjako mato yathā dīpa ityarthaḥ vibhāvādistu svajanyavyañjanādhīnajñānabhinnasyā'svādātmakarasāderjanaka eva na dīpavat
GK16visa03cu:292: anyathābhāve anyathātve svajanyaṃ pratyapi svasvavyañjakatve ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:293: asya vibhāvādeḥ kārakāt ko viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:294: ghaṭapratīpavat dvau yau vyaṅgyavyañjakau tayoḥ sakāśādanayoḥ rasavibhāvādyoḥ pārthakyaṃ vailakṣaṇyamevetyarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:295: na tu vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ parasparaṃ pārthakyaṃ bheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:310: siddhe natu sādhye vyañjako mataḥ śabda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:316: ityuktadiśā ghaṭapradīpavadvyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ pārthakyameveti kathaṃ rasasya vyaṅgyateti cet, satyamuktam /
GK16visa03cu:320: pārthakyamityanena vyañjanāyā vyaṅgyasya ca pārthakyaṃ nyāyasiddhameva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:328: jñāptiḥ jñāpako vyāpāraḥ, abhidhālakṣaṇāvyañjanāḥ; tebhyo vyāpārebhyo bhinna ityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:330: tathā ca tad viṣaya eva rasaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:331: vyañjanādhīnajñānaṃ tu ratyadiviṣayaḥ tato bhinnameva ityato rasavyañjanādhīnajñānayornaikyamityuktam
GK16visa03cu:333: tathā ca vyañjanayā ratyādijñānameva, svādanākhyavyāpāreṇa tu rasāsvāda ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:334: nanu kathaṃ tarhi raso vyaṅgya ityucyate ityata āha---abhidhādīti /
GK16visa03cu:335: vilakṣaṇo vyāpāro vyañjanā raso vyaṅgya iti vyahgyarāmādiratyādyāropādhikaraṇasāmājikaratyādeḥ rasarūpatayā pariṇāmāt paramparayā vyaṅgya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:337: (lo, u) ata eveti--; āhurityasya vyaṅgyatvamuktaṃ bhavatītyatra
GK16visa03cu:339: ata eva-yato jñānarūpa eva rasa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:347: ata eva hi rasanāsvādanacamatkaraṇādayo vilakṣaṇā eva vyapadeśāḥ” iti /
GK16visa03cu:353: nanu tarhi karuṇādīnāṃ rasānāṃ duḥ khayatvādrasatvaṃ (tadunmukhatvaṃ ) na
GK16visa03cu:364: (vi, na) rase iti--karuṇādau rasa grāhye karuṇādirasasvarūpameva yat sukhaṃ jāyata ityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:367: rasādīnāmeva śokaduḥ khaṃ tajjñātṝṇaāṃ, sāmājikānāṃ tu sukhameva
GK16visa03cu:380: (vi, pa) asahṛdayānāmapi paraduḥ khajñānādapi duḥ khameva jāyate
GK16visa03cu:383: kiñca teṣu yadā duḥkhaṃ na ko 'pi syāttadunmukhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:384: nahi kaścat sacetā ātmano duḥkhāya pravarttate /
GK16visa03cu:398: duḥkhahetutva-prasaṅga iti--tathā ca tat--śravaṇe na kopi pravartate
GK16visa03cu:406: (vi, bha) duḥ khahetubhya iti---paraśokādayaḥ svaduḥ khahetava eva,
GK16visa03cu:410: śokaharṣādayo loke jāyantāṃ nāma laukikāḥ // VisSd_3.6 //
GK16visa03cu:414: svīya--śokaharṣāderhetutvagatebhyaḥ paraśokādikāraṇebhyo laukikāḥ śokaharṣādayo jāyantāṃ nāmeti tuṣyatu durjana iti nyāyena uktvā āha---alaukiketi /
GK16visa03cu:417: sukhaṃ sañjāyate tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo 'pīti kā kṣatiḥ // VisSd_3.7 //
GK16visa03cu:420: (lo, e) hetutvamiti--hetutvaṃ gatebhyo rāmavanavāsādibhyo lokasaṃśrayāt; natu kāvyasaṃśrayāt
GK16visa03cu:424: ye khalu rāmavanavāsādayo loke “duḥkhāraṇāni” ityucyante ta eva hi kāvyanāṭyasamarpitā alaukikavibhāvanavyāpāravattayā kāraṇaśabdavācyatāṃ vihāya alaukikavibhāvaśabdavācyatvaṃ bhajante /
GK16visa03cu:425: tebhyaśca surate dantadhātādibhya iva sukhameva jāyate /
GK16visa03cu:431: anena dekhakālādiviśeṣeṇaṣeṇa sukhamayasyāpi duḥ khamayatvaṃ; duḥ khamayasyāpi sukhamayatvam
GK16visa03cu:434: ataśca “laukikaśokaharṣādikāraṇobhyo laukikaśokaharṣādayo jāyante” iti loka eva pratiniyamaḥ
GK16visa03cu:440: “sarvebhyo 'pi vibhāvādibhyaḥ sukhameva jāyate” iti niyamānna kaściddoṣaḥ
GK16visa03cu:441: kathaṃ tarhi hariścandrādicaritasya kāvyanāṭyayorapi darśanaśravaṇābhyāmaśrupātā dayo jāyanta
GK16visa03cu:450: tarhi kathaṃ kāvyataḥ sarveṣāmīdṛśī rasābhivyaktirna jāyata ityata āha--
GK16visa03cu:451: na jāyate tadāsvādo vinā ratyādivāsanām // VisSd_3.8 //
GK16visa03cu:456: vāsanā cedānīntanī prāktanī ca rasāsvādahetuḥ, tatra yadyādyā na syāttadā śrotriyajaranmīmāṃsakādīnāmapi sa syāt /
GK16visa03cu:462: naca prāktanavāsanābhāvādeva teṣāṃ na kāvyarasāsvāda ityevamucyatām,
GK16visa03cu:463: kimarthamidānīntana-vāsanāṅgīkāraḥ iti vācyam, teṣāmeva tarkānuśīlanatyāgena kāvyānuśīlanābhyāse rasodvodhena idānīntanyā api
GK16visa03cu:466: yadi dvitīyā na syāttadā yadragiṇā mapi keṣāñcidrasodvodho na dṛśyate tanna syāt /
GK16visa03cu:473: natu tatra idānīntanatvādipraveśaḥ jaran mīmāṃsakānāṃ tu atyantatarkānurāga eva pratibandha ityevānvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:498: yasya hanūmadādeḥ pāthodhiplavanādayaḥ āsan pramātā tadabhedena svātmānaṃ pratipadyata ityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:501: bhedāgrahe satyena abhedagraha upapadyate ityata āha---tadabhedeneti
GK16visa03cu:511: bhedena pratipattau tu ātmaniṣṭaroṣādisthāyibhāvodvodho na syāt /
GK16visa03cu:512: evaṃ ca yo doṣaḥ samanantarameva darśayiṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:519: (vi, sa) itthaṃ svasmin hanumadādyābhedāropamuktvā tadutsāhajñānādeva svotsāhodvodhamupapādayitumāśaṅkate
GK16visa03cu:530: (lo, i) sādhāraṇyābhimānataḥ--uktaprakāreṇa vibhāvādīnāṃ sādhāraṇīkaraṇavyāpāraprabhāvenotpannasya svātmani sādhāraṇyābhimānabalāt
GK16visa03cu:558: parasya na parasyeti mameti na mameti ca /
GK16visa03cu:559: tadāsvāde vibhāvādeḥ paricchedo na vidyate // VisSd_3.12 //
GK16visa03cu:565: evaṃ ca vibhāvādayaḥ svayaṃ sādhāraṇyena pratyāyayantītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:569: alaukikatvameteṣāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ na tu dūṣaṇam // VisSd_3.13 //
GK16visa03cu:580: asya yogārthasyānubhāvādāvapi sattveti paribhāṣāyā yogarūḍhatvānna tatra prayogaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:587: evaṃbhūtasya āsvādāṅkuratāṃ prāpitasya ratyādeḥ svaniṣṭhasvādanākhyavyāpāreṇa rasarūpatayā praveśanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:591: vibhāvādīnāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kāraṇakāryyasahakāritve kathaṃ trayāṇāmapi rasodbodhe kāraṇatvamityucyate
GK16visa03cu:597: rasodvodhe vibhāvādyāḥ kāraṇānyeva te matāḥ // VisSd_3.14 //
GK16visa03cu:598: nanu tarhi kathaṃ rasāsvāde teṣāmekaḥ pratibhāsa ityucyate--
GK16visa03cu:605: tataḥ sambalitaḥ sarvo vibhāvādiḥ sacetasām // VisSd_3.15 //
GK16visa03cu:613: nanu yadi vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāribhirmmilitaireva rasastat kathaṃ teṣāmekasya dvayorvā sadbhāve 'pi sa syādityucyate--
GK16visa03cu:622: “dīrghākṣaṃ śaradindukāntivadanaṃ bāhū natāvaṃsayoḥ saṅkṣiptaṃ nibiḍonnatastanamuraḥ pārśve pramṛṣṭe iva /
GK16visa03cu:623: madhyaḥ pāṇimito nitambi jaghanaṃ pādāvudagrāṅgulī chando narttayituryathaiva manasaḥ sṛṣṭaṃ tathāsyā vapuḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:627: uttamanaṭīṃ nartuyiturmanaso yathaivacchanda icchā tathaivāsyā vapuḥ sṛṣṭam (vidhātrā) tadevāha--dīrghākṣamiti--bāhū--aṃsayoḥ svamūlayornatau /
GK16visa03cu:629: nibiḍau--anyonyasaṃsaktau unnatau ca stanau yatra tādṛśaṃ ca uruḥ /
GK16visa03cu:632: jaghanottarabhāgaḥ nitambaḥ praśastaḥ tad yuktaṃ jaghanam,
GK16visa03cu:638: sṛṣṭaṃ vidhātrā iti śeṣaḥ nartayitā nartakīṣu dīrghākṣatvādyabhinayena darśayituṃ śikṣayati, mālavikāyāṃ sahajasaundaryādeva tadastīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:664: sītādidarśanādijo rāmādiratyādyudbodho hi parimito laukiko nāṭyakāvyadarśanādeḥ sāntarāyaśca, tasmāt kathaṃ rasarūpatāmiyāt /
GK16visa03cu:675: (vi, ṭha) sa yadā kāvyārthabhāvakaḥ syāttadā sopi sāmājiko
GK16visa03cu:680: yadi punarnaṭo 'pi kāvyārthabhāvanayā rāmādisvarūpatāmātmano darśayet tadā so 'pi sabhyamadhya eva gaṇyate /
GK16visa03cu:689: (vi, ḍa) yadyapyuktarītyā rasasya sākṣāt kriyamāṇatvaṃ kāryatvaṃ kādācitkatvena bhaviṣyadvartamānatvaṃ
GK16visa03cu:690: taj-jñānasya sākṣātkararūpatvaṃ ca tathāpi tasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ sādhayituṃ
GK16visa03cu:691: sākṣāt kriyamāṇghaṭādito 'pi vailakṣaṇyasādhanena kautukādasākṣāt kriyamāṇatvaṃ kāraṇaviśeṣakāryatvasya kenaciduktasya dūṣaṇena kautukāt sāmānyato 'kāryatvamevamabhaviṣyatvādikamapi kautukād vaktuṃ prathamaṃ
GK16visa03cu:705: (lo, a) nāyaṃ jñāpya iti--ayaṃ rasaḥ sattāyāṃ sadbhāve
GK16visa03cu:709: yo hi jñāpyo ghaṭādiḥ sannapi kadācidajñāto bhavati, na hyayaṃ tathā;
GK16visa03cu:715: (vi, ḍha) hetuviśeṣakāryatvaṃ rasasya ye vadanti tanmataṃ nirasyati---yasmādeṣa ityādi tasmānna kārya ityantena /
GK16visa03cu:716: ayamarthaḥ ---”prapānakarasanyāyāccarvyamāṇo raso bhavedityuktyā vibhāvādiratyādisamūhālambanātmako rasa ityuktam /
GK16visa03cu:718: kecittu tatsamakālotpannaṃ vyañjanayāpi tādṛśaṃ samūhālambanānantaraṃ jāyate, tatkārya eva rasa ityāhuḥ, tannirasyati---yasmādeṣa iti /
GK16visa03cu:719: eṣa raso yasmāt svādanākhyavyāparādhīnasamūhālambanātmakaḥ, ato na kāryaḥ, na samūhālambanakāryaḥ svasya svakāryatvāt svakālotpattikasya vyañjanādhīnasamūhālambanāntarasyābhāvācceti bhāvaḥ tatra svasya svakāryatvāsambhavasya sphuṭatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:721: (lo, a) rasasyeti--nahi vibhāvādijñānakāraṇakamityanantaraṃ tataścānupalabhyamānakāraṇāntarasya rasasya na kāryatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:723: yadi rasaḥ kāryaḥ syāttadā vibhāvādijñānakāraṇaka eva syāt /
GK16visa03cu:731: “pratīyamānaḥ prathamaṃ pratyekaṃ heturucyate”ityanena pratyekasya hetutvoktyā tatkāryatve vipratipattyabhāvāt /
GK16visa03cu:736: (vi, ta) nanu tādṛśsamūhātambanakāraṇatve ko doṣaḥ ityāha--tataśceti
GK16visa03cu:743: (vi, tha) kāraṇajñānasya sthitiḥ kāryajñānasyotpattiriti tu na sambhavatyeva /
GK16visa03cu:766: evaṃ rasasya samūhālambanakāryatvameva khaṇḍitaṃ natu kāryatvam /
GK16visa03cu:772: nanu pūrvasaṃvedanābhāvānnityatvābhāve itaraṣāmapi nityavastūnāmabhāvaprasaṅga ityata āha-asamvetaneti
GK16visa03cu:776: asaṃvedanakāle hi na bhāvo 'ṣyasya vidyate (ka) // VisSd_3.21 //
GK16visa03cu:779: (vi, na) nityatvābhāvaḥ spaṣṭa eva, tamāha--no nitya iti /
GK16visa03cu:785: (lo, i) nāpi bhaviṣyannityāha--sākṣādanubhūyamānasya hi kathaṃ bhaviṣyattm
GK16visa03cu:786: yasya khalu vastuno bhaviṣyattvaṃ sahajo dharmastat sadā bhaviṣyadeveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:792: (vi, pa) nāpi bhaviṣyanniti yadyapi saṃvedanāt pūrvam asattvenaiva
GK16visa03cu:794: tathāpi bhaviṣyatpadārthāntarasya sākṣādānandamayaprakāśatvasvarūpābhāvāt tadvailakṣaṇyameva bhaviṣyatvābhāvaḥ kautukāduktaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:802: yadyapi ghaṭādisādhāraṇajñāpyatvasyaiva samūhālambanakāryatvasyaiva cābhāvaḥ prag darśitaḥ, tathāpi tāvataiva kāryatvajñāpyatvābhāvaṃ
GK16visa03cu:805: svaprakāśarūpasya svameva grāhakaṃ, tattu na nirvikalpakamityāha--vibhāvādīti /
GK16visa03cu:808: tat pradhānatvāditi kvacit pāṭhe tatparāmarśaḥ pratyekaṃ taj jñānaṃ,
GK16visa03cu:812: antye tu jñānajanyatvena nirvikalpakatvābhāvāt, jñānajanyajñānasyaiva nirvikalpakatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:815: tathā ca na nirvikalpakaṃ niṣprakārakajñānasyaiva tathātvāt /
GK16visa03cu:817: (lo, ī) nirvikalpakaṃ jñānam--asti hmālocanamātraprathamaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ jñānam, amukāsadṛśaṃ jñānaṃ śuddhavastujamityuktaprakāraṃ,
GK16visa03cu:819: sa eva raso nirvikalpakajñānatvena gṛhyamāṇo na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:821: tatra pakṣe yasya grāhakatvamiṣyate ityatra nopacāraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:828: yadyapi tadgrāhakasya nirvikalpakatvābhāvayuktipradarśanenaiva savikalpakasaṃvedyatvaṃ siddhaṃ tathāpi savikalpakasaṃvedyāntarato vailakṣaṇyena tadavedyatvaṃ kautukāduktam /
GK16visa03cu:831: tasya vibhāvādyabhidhānadvāreṇaiva tasya jñeyatvam, natu kāvyasthaśabdena /
GK16visa03cu:832: pratyuta tasya tatkāvyasya śabdavācyatve svaśabdavācyatvaṃ doṣa eva vakṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:833: atra eva kāvyaprakāśakṛtāpyuktaṃ,”rasādilakṣaṇastvarthaḥ svapreti na vācya'; iti /
GK16visa03cu:835: savikalpakavedyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ tatkāvyasthaśabdenaiva vācyamiti tato vailakṣaṇyamiti vacanam
GK16visa03cu:837: savikalpakajñānasaṃvedyānāṃ hi vacanaprayogayogyatā, na tu rasasya tathā /
GK16visa03cu:848: sākṣātkārānantaravailakṣaṇyapratipādanāya sākṣātkārarūpasyāpi tatprakāśasya sākṣātkāratvābhāvamapi kautukādāha--nāparokṣa iti /
GK16visa03cu:853: (lo, ṛ) tathābhilāpeti--atrāpi pūrvavat raso na savikalpakarūpa iti /
GK16visa03cu:859: ataḥ paramityatra idamānupūrvoktanirvikalpakaparāmarśaḥ śabdasaṃbhāvta śābdajñānam parokṣamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:860: tat kathayatitattvaṃ svarūpaṃ, pūrvaṃ na śruto na dṛṣṭaścoktasvarūpo nirūpaṇaprakāro yasya rasasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:866: (vi, ya) itthaṃ kiñcit vastutaḥ kiñcicca kautukād vailakṣaṇyamuktvā
GK16visa03cu:867: kīdṛśaṃ tādṛśavilakṣaṇaṃ vastu tat iti pṛcchati; tat kathayati /
GK16visa03cu:882: tatkiṃ punaḥ pramāṇaṃ tasya sadbhāva ityāha--
GK16visa03cu:883: pramāṇaṃ carvaṇaivātra svābhinne viduṣāṃ matam // VisSd_3.26 //
GK16visa03cu:891: evaṃ ca sahṛdayānubhava evātra pramāṇamiti paryavasyati /
GK16visa03cu:900: lakṣyavyaṅgyavastūnāṃ sambhedāt jñānāt ātmano rasasyānandarūpeṇa samudbhavaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:903: nanu yadi raso na kāryastatkathaṃ mahaṣiṇā(ka)
GK16visa03cu:909: (vi, va) rāmādiratyādeḥ sāmājikaratyādervo uddīpanavibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārijanyatvaṃ nāstyeva, tatastadātmakasya rasasya tatsākṣātkārāṃśamātrajanyatvaṃ siddhāntayituṃ kautukoktamapi tasyākāryatvamuktvā āśaṅkate--nanu yadi raso na kārya iti /
GK16visa03cu:913: itthaṃ vibhāvāditaścarvaṇāyā niṣpattireva vāstavikaratyādyaṃśasya tato niṣpattirupacaritetyuktyā carvaṇāṃśasyāpi niṣpattirupacaritaiveti vaktumāha---yadyapīti /
GK16visa03cu:916: tataśca ratyādirūparasābhinna eva carvaṇātmakaḥ sākṣātkārastathā ratyādeḥ vibhāvādyakāryatayaiva carvaṇasyāpi vibhāvādyakāryatvamarthasiddhamiti yadyapi ratyāderarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:918: tathāpi tasya kādācitkatayā upacaritena kāryatvena kāryatvamupacaryate /
GK16visa03cu:924: kintu vibhāvādijñānettarameva niṣpannetyevaṃ kādācitkatayā upacaritena kāryatvena kāryatvamupacaryate ityartha /
GK16visa03cu:925: nacaivamanyathāsiddhavibhāvādijñānottarabhāvitvena tatkāryatvaṃ carvaṇāyām avāstavameva tat kathamupacāra iti vācyam /
GK16visa03cu:928: (lo, e) yadyapītyādi---ayamarthaḥ samanantaroktaprakāreṇa rasābhinne carvaṇe kādācitkatvād vastuni vyabhicāreṇa tasya kāryatvaṃ
GK16visa03cu:930: tena carvaṇasyāparicitena kāryatvena tadabhinne rasepi kāryatvamupacārāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:943: nanu yadi militā ratyādayo rasāstatkathamasya svaprakāśatvaṃ kathaṃ
GK16visa03cu:967: tasya pratimānataḥ satsādṛśyāt ityādyaṃśopi svaprakāśa iti /
GK16visa03cu:968: nanu yadi caitanyasya sajñānatvena jaḍasya svaprakāśatā tadā pramātṛbhāvamāpannasyāntaḥ karaṇasyāpi svaprakāśatvaṃ syāditi cenmaivam /
GK16visa03cu:969: tatra hi triguṇātmake manasi sattvāṃśasya rajastamobhyāmaspṛṣṭatvam /
GK16visa03cu:971: naca tayoḥ śavalatvamapi tāttvikaṃ, kuto tādātmyamiti,
GK16visa03cu:974: yadi ratyādikaṃ prakāśaśarīrādatiriktaṃ syāttadaivāsya svaprakāśatvaṃ na
GK16visa03cu:977: “yadyapi rasānanyatayā carvaṇāpi na kāryā tathāpi kādācitkatayā
GK16visa03cu:982: “abhinno 'pi sa pramātrā vāsanopanītaratyāditādātmyena gocarīkṛtaḥ” iti ca /
GK16visa03cu:989: tayā rasādirūpā pariṇatiryasya tādṛśarūpe ratyādibhāge vibhāvādikāryatvavyavahāraḥ ityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:990: dvitīya iti ceti paryantaṃ samvādavākyatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:997: gecarīkṛta iti cidānandamayoyaṃ puruṣa iti vadupacāraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1001: ratyādayo hi prathamamekaikaśaḥ pratīyamānāḥ sarve 'pyekībhūtāḥ sphuranta eva rasatāmāpadyante
GK16visa03cu:1012: vibhāvā ityādi kārikāyāṃ ratyādiprakāśasukhacamatkārā akaṇṭhoktā api prakaraṇadavaseyāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1020: brahmatattvavaditi---khaṇḍākhaṇaaḍanānāpadārthānām advaitabhāvānayā akhaṇḍasvarūpatvāt brahmatattvasya itica ityantaṃ samvādavākyam /
GK16visa03cu:1023: [text of comm. wanting in both printed ed. and Sansknet e-text!]
GK16visa03cu:1025: athaṃ ke te vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṇa ityapekṣāyāṃ vibhāvamāha--
GK16visa03cu:1030: ye hi loke rāmādigataratihāsādīnāmudvodhakāraṇāni sītādayasta eva kāvye nāṭye ca niveśitāḥ santaḥ “vibhāvyante āsvādāṅkuraprādurbhāvayogyāḥ kriyante sāmājikaratyādibhāvā ebhiḥ” iti vibhāvā ucyante /
GK16visa03cu:1035: natu pratītyarthaṃ kathaṃ viśeṣeṇa bhāvyantetatpratipādanasāmarthya eva tathātvaucityādityata āhaāsvādāṅkureti /
GK16visa03cu:1036: yata ebhirvibhāvādibhiḥ sāmājikaratyādibhāvā āsvādāṅkuraprādurbhāvayogyāḥ kriyante, ato viśeṣeṇa bhāvyanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1037: ato vibhāvā ucyante ityarthaḥ sāmājikaratyādibhāvānāṃ tathātvakaraṇaṃ rāmādiratyādīnāṃ ca tatrāropāt bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:1040: asyā paribhāṣāyāyogārūḍhatvādetadyogārthasyānubhāvādau sattvepi na tatra prayoga iti prāgapyuktam
GK16visa03cu:1048: raudrarasasthāyibhāvasthālambanavibhāvān śabdopahitarūpān śabdopasthāpyāt pratyakṣāniva sāmājikā manyante /
GK16visa03cu:1054: (lo, ī) śabdeti---śabdopahitarūpān kāvyarūpaśabdopādhinā śravaṇāt tadvuddhiviṣayatāmāpannānāṃ sādhanatvena sotsāhādyudabodhe manyante sabhyā iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1063: atha yasya rasasya yo vibhāvaḥ sa tatsvarūpavarṇane vakṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:1090: (vi, ja) prathamaṃ caturbheda iti---paścāttu dhīrodāttādīnām api dakṣiṇadhṛṣṭatvādibhedasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:1127: tatra teṣāṃ dhīrodāttādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ dakṣiṇadhṛṣṭānukūlaśaṭhatvena ṣoḍaśaprakārā nāyakaḥ
GK16visa03cu:1128: eṣu tvanekamahilāsu samarāgo dakṣiṇaḥ kathitaḥ // VisSd_3.35 //
GK16visa03cu:1137: snātā tiṣṭhati kuntaleśvarasutā, vāro 'ṅgarājasvasurdyūtai rātririyaṃ jitā kalamayā, devī prasādyādya ca /
GK16visa03cu:1138: ityantaḥ purasundarīḥ prati mayā vijñāyā vijñāpite devenāpratipattimūḍhamanasā dvitrāḥ sthitaṃ nāḍikāḥ //
GK16visa03cu:1142: anekapatnīsambhogārhā iyaṃ rātririti tatkarmaniyuktasya rājñi nivedanam /
GK16visa03cu:1149: sarvāsu anurāgasāmyena kasyāpyupekṣānarhatvāt apratipattyā kartavyanirṇayābhāvena mūḍhamanaskatvena dvitrādidaṇḍasthitiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1159: śoṇaṃ vīkṣya mukhaṃ vicumbitumahaṃ yātaḥ samīpaṃ tataḥ pādena prahṛtaṃ
GK16visa03cu:1160: tayā, sapadi taṃ dhṛtvā sahāse mayi /
GK16visa03cu:1161: kiñcittatra vidhātumakṣamatayā bāṣpaṃ sṛjantyāḥ sakhe ! dhyātaścetasi kautukaṃ vitanute kopo 'pi vāmabhruvaḥ //
GK16visa03cu:1164: (vi, ḍha) śoṇaṃ vīkṣyeti---roṣāruṇamukhīṃ priyāṃ cumbituṃ gatasya
GK16visa03cu:1165: tayā prahartumudyataṃ pādaṃ dhṛtvā kiñcit kartumakṣamīkṛtāṃ rudatīṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā hasitavato nāyakasya sakhyau vṛttāntakathanamidam /
GK16visa03cu:1174: asmākaṃ sakhi ! vāsasī na rucire, graiveyakaṃ nojjvalaṃ, no vakrā gātiruddhataṃ na hasitaṃ, naivāsti, kaścinmadaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1175: kintvanye 'pi janā vadanti subhago 'pyasyāḥ priyo nānyato dṛṣṭaṃ
GK16visa03cu:1179: (vi, ṇa) asmākaṃ sakhīti--paṣyau subhagāyā sakhyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:1181: kintu na kevalamahamanyepi janā vadanti asyāḥ patiranyato 'nyasyāṃ
GK16visa03cu:1183: viśvam---etad viśvavarti strījanaṃ duḥ sthitaṃ, mayi asūyayā madapekṣayā saubhāgyālpatvena vā duḥ sthitaṃ vayaṃ manyāmahe /
GK16visa03cu:1194: yaḥ punarekasyāmeva nāyikāyāṃ baddhabhāvo dvayorapi nāyikayorbahirdarśitānurāgo 'nyasyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ gūḍhaṃ vipriyamācarita sa śaṭhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1202: (vi, ta) śaṭhānyasyā iti---nāyikāyā vipriyakāriṇaṃ nāyakaṃ bhartsayantyā sakhyā uktiriyam
GK16visa03cu:1203: he śaṭha ! mama sakhīm āśliṣyanneva tvaṃ yadanyasyā nāyikāyāḥ
GK16visa03cu:1206: ato me sakhī ghṛtamadhumayena miśritaghṛtamadhurūpeṇa tvadīyabahucāṭuvacoviṣeṇāghūrṇantī kimapi kartavyaṃ na gaṇayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1221: (vi, da) atha prasaṅgāditi---atra eṣāmityanena nāyakamātrasyaiva parāmarśo natu prakānta śṛṅgārīyāṣṭacatvāriṃśata eva /
GK16visa03cu:1222: ata eva rāmasya sugrīvaḥ sahāyo darśayiṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:1238: (vi, dha) dūrānuvartinīti vyācaṣṭe---tasyeti dūrānuvartini ityasya vyākhyā bahuvyāpinīti bahudeśavyāpyasādhye ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1245: bhaktā narmasu nipuṇāḥ kupitavadhūmānabhañjanāḥ śuddhāḥ // VisSd_3.40 //
GK16visa03cu:1249: veśopacārakuśalo vāggmī madhuro 'tha bahumato goṣṭhyām // VisSd_3.41 //
GK16visa03cu:1265: karmaṇā, vapuṣā, veśena, vāsanadinā bhāṣādyaiḥ sarveṣāṃ hāsyaṃ janayati /
GK16visa03cu:1286: “mantrī svaṃ cobhayaṃ vāpi sakhā tasyārthacintane” iti kenācillakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam, tadapi rājñor'thacintanopāyalakṣaṇaprakaraṇo lakṣayitavyam, na tu sahāyakathanaprakaraṇo /
GK16visa03cu:1287: “nāyakasyārthacintane mantrī sahāyaḥ” ityukte 'pi nāyakasyārthata eva siddhatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:1290: (vi, ma) svaṃ ceti--svaṃ rājā tasya rājñaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1292: atra svasyāpi sahāyatvena kathanāt pūrvasmād bhedaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1297: “mantriṇāṃ lalitaḥ śeṣā mantriṣvāyattasiddhayaḥ” iti, tadapi svalakṣaṇakathanenaika lakṣitasya dhīralalitasya mantrimātrāyattārthacintanopapattergatārtham /
GK16visa03cu:1298: na cārthacintane tasya mantrī sahāyaḥ, kiṃ tu svayameva saṃpādakaḥ;
GK16visa03cu:1302: (vi, ya) mantriṇeti---lalito dhīralalitastādṛśo rājā mantriṇaivārthasādhakaḥ iti śeṣaḥ, svasya śṛṅgāraniratatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:1306: “niścinto mṛduraniśaṃ kalāparo dhīralalitaḥ syāditi dhīralalitalakṣaṇe niścintetvainārthacintanasya
GK16visa03cu:1312: ayaṃ mantrī syādarthānāṃ cintāyāmiti sūtrasya parabhāgaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1316: sahāyakathanaprastāve mantriṇa eva sahāyatvakathanaṃ yuktam; natu ātmana ubhayasya vā /
GK16visa03cu:1318: kintu rājā kenārthacintanaṃ kuryādityapekṣāyāmeva kvacin mantriṇā
GK16visa03cu:1321: kiñca tadapyarthacintanopāyaprakaraṇa eva lakṣitavyam; natu sahāyakathanaprakaraṇe /

GK16visa03cu:2025: prathamaṃ kāntamabhisārayantyā tataḥ kāntamabhisārantyā udāharaṇamiti brūmaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2027: na ca me 'vagacchati yathā laghutāṃ karuṇāṃ yathā ca kurute sa mayi /
GK16visa03cu:2034: evaṃ nāyakamabhigamya nipuṇaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ vadeḥ ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2036: “utkṣiptaṃ karakaṅkaṇadvayamidaṃ, baddhā dṛḍhaṃ mekhalā, yatnena pratipāditā mukharayormañjīrayormūkatā
GK16visa03cu:2042: tamasvinyāṃ candrodayāt pathi svasyā abhisārabhaṅga sakhyāṃ kathayantyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:2043: avaguṇṭhanāmācchādanaṃ, tasya kṣepamapasāraṇaṃ vidhatte iti atītasāmīpye vartamānaṃ vyadhādityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:2053: (vi, ṭha) āviddhagatisaṃcāreti---āviddhaḥ sabhaṅgīkā pitṛgṛhagatyarthaṃ saṃcāro yasyāstādṛśī
GK16visa03cu:2062: “iti iyaṃ hi abhisarantīṃ veśyāṃ prati śāntasya kasyaciduktiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2068: tāmbūlāktaṃ daśanamasakṛddarśayantīha ceṭī ghoṭī hreṣād vikṛtaruditaṃ hetuhīnaṃ hasantī /
GK16visa03cu:2077: mālāpañcaḥ śmaśānaṃ ca nadyādīnāṃ taṭī tathā // VisSd_3.80 //
GK16visa03cu:2082: (vi, ḍha) mālāmañcamudyānam, kutracidāśraya ityatra vinoda iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2092: “no cāṭuśravaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ, na ca dṛśā hāro 'ntike vīkṣitaḥ, kāntasya priyahetave nijasakhīvāco 'pi dūrīkṛtāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2093: pādānte vinipatya tatkṣaṇamasau gacchanmayā mūḍhayā pāṇibhyāmavarudhya inta ! sahasā kaṇṭhe kathaṃ nārpitaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:2100: priyaḥ kṛtvāpi saṃketaṃ yasyā nāyāti saṃnidhim /
GK16visa03cu:2101: vipralabdhā tu sā jñeyā nitāntamavamānitā // VisSd_3.83 //
GK16visa03cu:2110: yā nāyikā ataḥ paramapi jīvet tasyā evāsau jīvitanātho bhavet;
GK16visa03cu:2116: “tāṃ jānīyāḥ parimitakathāṃ jīvitaṃ me dvitīyaṃ dūrībhūte mayi sahacare cakravākīmivaikām
GK16visa03cu:2117: gāḍhotkaṇṭhāṃ guruṣu divaseṣveṣu gacchatsu bālāṃ jātāṃ manye śiśiramathitāṃ padminīṃ vānyarūpām”
GK16visa03cu:2122: tāṃ jānīyā iti---śāpapratiruddhapriyāsaṃnidhagamanasya yakṣasya meghaṃ saṃbodhya priyāvasthākathanamidam
GK16visa03cu:2124: eṣu guruṣu divaseṣu gacchatsugāḍhotkaṇṭhāmata eva śiśiramathitāṃ padminīmivānyarūpāṃ jātāmaham ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2130: “vidūre keyūre kuru, karayuge ratnavalayair alaṃ, gurvo grīvābharaṇalatikeyaṃ kimanayā /
GK16visa03cu:2131: navāmekāmekāvalimayi mayi tvaṃ viracayer na nepathyaṃ
GK16visa03cu:2136: sajjite keliyogyatayā sajjīkṛte vāsaveśmani yasyā maṇḍanaṃ sakhī kuruta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2140: vāsagṛhe nāyakasaṃyogārtham alpabhūṣaṇaracanārthaṃ sakhīṃ prerayantyāstāṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:2141: ayi sakhi tvaṃ navīnām ekāmekāvalīṃ hāraṃ mayi viracayeḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2142: yato 'naṅgotsavavidhau bahutaraṃ nepathyaṃ veśaḥ na pathyaṃ na hitam;
GK16visa03cu:2143: kaṭhinasaṃyogatvena āliṅgane duḥ khadāyakakṛt atolaṅkārāntaraṃ niṣedhati /
GK16visa03cu:2151: “kiṃ ruddhaḥ priyayā kayāci, dathavā sakhyā mamodvejitaḥ, kiṃ vā kāraṇagauravaṃ kimapi, yannādyāgato vallabhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2152: ityālocya mṛgīdṛśā karatale vinyasya vaktrāmbujaṃ dīrghaṃ niḥ śvasitaṃ,
GK16visa03cu:2158: kiṃ ruddha iti---paroḍhākanyakayorupanāyakasya svīyāyāśca sapatnigṛhaṃ gatasya nāyakasyānāgamanenotkaṇṭhitayā iti pūrvārddhektimālocya vaktrāmbujaṃ karatale vinyasya dīrghaṃ niśvasitamityādi /
GK16visa03cu:2180: (vi, ḍha) atra parastriyoḥ kanyakoḍhayoravasthātrayasya evāsaṃbhavāt aṣṭaguṇatvābhāvena uktasaṃkhyāna bhaviṣyatīti kaścidāha--tadṛrśayati /
GK16visa03cu:2182: saṃketāt pūrvamiti saṃketāt hetoḥ pūrvaṃ vilahotkaṇṭhite paścāt vidūṣaketyādyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2187: vāsakasajjātvāvasthā tu patighaṭitaiva na bhavati ityataḥ kanyakāparoḍhayorapi tāḥ pañcāvasthāḥ saṃbhavantyeva /
GK16visa03cu:2188: evaṃ ca svastriyā api pitṛgṛhasthāyāḥ pitradhīnatvena patyā saha svacchandasambhogāsaṃbhavāt
GK16visa03cu:2194: kaścidityasaṃtoṣoktiḥ, tathā hi jayadevakṛtagītagovinde mama pitṝṇāṃ kaṃsavadhe parastriyā
GK16visa03cu:2195: aṣṭāvapyavasthāḥ spaṣṭameva prakāśitāḥ, anyasyāpyātmīyatvena parigṛhītasya parayoṣidupabhogeṣvavasthocitā
GK16visa03cu:2197: tathāpi mānena kathaṃcid vibhāvadarśanārthamabhimukhaṃ nāyake gate kalahāntaritātvam /
GK16visa03cu:2207: “na khalu vayamamuṣya dānayogyāḥ pibati ca pāti ca yāsakau rahastvām /
GK16visa03cu:2208: viṭa ! viṭapamamuṃ dadasva tasyai bhavati yataḥ sadṛśościrāya yogaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2211: (vi, ta) na khalu vayamiti---kusumitaviṭapaṃ ditsuṃ svanāyakaṃ prati
GK16visa03cu:2212: kopanāyā uktiriyam “he viṭa ! dhūrtta !amuṣya viṭapasya dānayogyā na khalu vayam /
GK16visa03cu:2213: kintu asakau asau yā upanāyikā tvāṃ cakṣuṣā pibati surate prītijananāt pratipālayati ca tasyai amu viṭapaṃ dadasva yataḥ sadṛśoryogaśacirāya bhavati /
GK16visa03cu:2214: asadṛśostu kṣaṇikakṛt niṣphala ityarthaḥ, sadṛśatvaṃ ca darśitayogārthavaśāt /
GK16visa03cu:2215: sāpi viṭapī ayaṃ ca viṭapa iti sādṛśyam /
GK16visa03cu:2217: (lo, au) na khalviti--pibati sarvato niruddhaprasarīkṛtya svāmatrāyattatāyāṃ praveśayati upabhuṅktevā /
GK16visa03cu:2222: evañcānayorviṭapatvena sadṛśayorviṭapayuvayorvā garhitatvena sadṛśayorvā ucito yogo yataḥ tasyaiva viṭapapradānena bhavatīti ubhayathā sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2228: (vi, tha) tava kitaveti---vṛkṣapallavaṃ karṇapūraṃ dadānaṃ nāyakaṃ
GK16visa03cu:2230: he kitava ! dhūrta ! āhataiḥ dattaiḥ kṣitiruhāṇāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ pallavarūpaiḥ karṇapūraiḥ mama kiṃ prayojanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2231: nanu bhoḥ janaviditaiḥ bhavadvyalīkaiḥ bhavadapakarmabhiḥ mama karṇayugmaṃ ciraparipūritameva
GK16visa03cu:2232: tathā ca yogārthavaśāt bhavadvyalīkameva me karṇapūra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2235: vasatimupagatena dhāmni tasyāḥ śaṭha ! kalireṣa mahāṃstvayādya dattaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:2240: (vi, da) iti gaditeti---pūrvarṇitanāyikāto 'nyā nāyikā iti gaditavatī
GK16visa03cu:2241: satī ruṣā amburuheṇa cakṣuṣā ca taṃ nāyakaṃ jaghāna /
GK16visa03cu:2243: viśeṣaṇamāha---sphuriteti---sphuritaṃ manoharaṃ pakṣmaiva keśaravat yasya tādṛśena cakṣuṣā
GK16visa03cu:2244: sphuritomanoharapakṣmavat keśaro yasya tādṛśena amburuheṇa, tathā śravaṇaparyantaniyamitena cakṣuṣā śravaṇe niyamitena amburuheṇa ubhayatra sthāpanameva niyamanam /
GK16visa03cu:2246: iyaṃ hi vakroktyā paruṣavacanena karṇotpalatāḍanena ca dhīramadhyatādhīramadhyatādhīrapragalbhatābhiḥ saṃkīrṇā /
GK16visa03cu:2262: śobhā kāntiśca dīptiśca mādhuryaṃ ca pragalbhatā /
GK16visa03cu:2265: moṭṭāyitaṃ kuṭṭamitaṃ vibhramo lalitaṃ madaḥ // VisSd_3.91 //
GK16visa03cu:2269: pūrve bhāvādayo dhairyāntā daśa nāyakānāmapi saṃbhavanti /
GK16visa03cu:2270: kiṃtu sarve 'pyamī nāyikāśritā eva vicchittiviśeṣaṃ puṣṇānti /
GK16visa03cu:2276: atra bhāvādyāstrayaḥ śobhādyāḥ sapta līlādyā aṣṭādaśa iti aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2284: janmataḥ prabhṛti nirvikāre manasi udbuddhamātro vikāro bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2286: “sa eva surabhiḥ kālaḥ sa eva malayānilaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2296: (vi, na) vivṛṇvatī śailasutāpīti--tapasyato maheśasya samīpe kāmena
GK16visa03cu:2297: dhanuṣi āropite pārvalā hāvavarṇanamidam, kvacit tasthāvityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2299: bālakadambapuṣpatulyatām aṅgānāṃ pulakena mukhena sācīkṛtā vakrīkṛtā;
GK16visa03cu:2302: (lo, ī) vivṛṇvatīti atna hāve 'pi bhāvaviśeṣatvāt bhāvaśabdaprayogaḥ mukhena sācīkṛtā na saṃmukhībhūtetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2309: “taha te jhatti pauttā vahue savvaṅgavibbhamā saalā /
GK16visa03cu:2310: saṃsai amuddhabhāvā hoi ciraṃ jai sahīṇaṃ pi” //
GK16visa03cu:2313: (vi, pa) tathā tasyā jhaṭiti pravṛttā vadhvāḥ sarvāṅgavibhramāḥ
GK16visa03cu:2325: kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyātparaṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede” //
GK16visa03cu:2329: asambhṛtaṃ maṇḍanamiti--sā pārvatī atha anantaraṃ bālyāt paraṃ vayaḥ
GK16visa03cu:2334: anāsavākhyam āsavasya madirāyā yā ākhyā saṃjñā tadrahitamāsavabhinnamitiyāvat /
GK16visa03cu:2335: puṣpabhinnaṃ kāmasya astram aṅgabhūṣaṇam aṅgaśobhā asambhṛtamaṇḍanamiti /
GK16visa03cu:2364: “sarasijamanuviddhaṃ śaivalenāpi ramyaṃ malinamapi himāṃśolarlakṣma lakṣmīṃ tanoti /
GK16visa03cu:2365: iyamadhikamanojñā valkalenāpi tanvī kimi hi madhuraṇāṃ maṇḍanaṃ nākṛtīnām”
GK16visa03cu:2382: “na brūte paruṣāṃ giraṃ vitanute na bhrayugaṃ bhaṅgaraṃ, nottaṃsaṃ kṣipati kṣitau śravaṇataḥ sā me sphuṭe 'pyāgasi /
GK16visa03cu:2383: kāntā garbhagṛhe gāvākṣavivaravyāpāritākṣyā bahīḥ sakhyā vaktramabhiprayacchati paraṃ paryaśruṇī locane” //
GK16visa03cu:2388: me mama sphuṭe 'pyāgasi aparādhe s kāntā sakhyā vaktramabhi sakhyā
GK16visa03cu:2390: sakhyāḥ kīdṛśayāḥ sāgasaṃ māṃ draṣṭuṃ gavākṣavivaravyāpāritākṣyāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2391: mantu paruṣaṃ ruṣā na brūte ityādi spaṣṭam /
GK16visa03cu:2396: yathā--jvalatu gagane rātrau rātrāvakhaṇḍakalaḥ śaśī, dahatu madanaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:2398: mama tu dayitaḥ ślāghyastāto jananyamalānvayā kulamamalinaṃ na tvevāyaṃ jano na ca jīvitam”
GK16visa03cu:2401: (vi, ra) muktātmaślāghaneti---acañcalā manovṛttiryā muktātmaślāghanā sā dhairyyamiti bhāvaḥ
GK16visa03cu:2402: jvalatu iti gaurikāvivāhe udvejamānāyāstatra saṃmitāyāḥ mālatyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:2403: mama virahoddīpanāya rātrau akhaṇḍakalaḥ śaśī jvalatu /
GK16visa03cu:2405: mṛtyoḥ pareṇa karmaṇā kiṃvā tena vidhāsyate /
GK16visa03cu:2406: varaṃ mṛtyureva vidhīyate; tathāpi pitṛmātṛkulakalaṅkaṃ na
GK16visa03cu:2408: atastu mayi mama dayitaḥ drayāyogyo yataḥ khlāghyaḥ niṣkalaṅkaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2411: natvevāyaṃ jano mādhavaḥ dayito jīvitañca na dayitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2424: veṇībandhātmakakapardinī pārvatī sarpavalayasya jaṭāvato harasyānukāriṇī jagat pātvityanvayaḥ
GK16visa03cu:2438: atrāntara iti---vakulavīthyām upaviṣṭaṃ mādhavaṃ vilokya gajena yāntyā mālatyā harṣakriyāṃ makarande kathayataḥ mādhavasyoktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:2446: manmathadevārādhanena yaṃ yaṃ bhāvaviśeṣamadhigatavatī taṃ taṃ tatra prakāśitavatītyarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:2452: vāsastu pratanu viviktamastvitīyānākalpo yadi kusumeṣuṇā na śūnyaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:2457: svacchāmbha iti--vilāsinīnāmākalpo veśaḥ kusumeṣuṇā yadi na śūnyaḥ tadā iyānapyastu /
GK16visa03cu:2458: sa ka ityatrāha--svaccheti--svacchāmbhasi snapanena vidhautaṃ vikṣālitamaṅgam /
GK16visa03cu:2465: “yāsāṃ satyapi sadguṇānusaraṇo doṣānuvṛttiḥ parā, yāḥ prāṇān varamarpayanti, na punaḥ sampūrṇadṛṣṭiṃ priye /
GK16visa03cu:2473: tacca garvāt cāṭuṃ kārayituṃ priyeparaṃ kevalaṃ prāṇān arpayantīti anvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2477: (lo, ū) atyantābhimate iti--niṣadhātmako vidhiḥ kimanenāsmākam ityādyanādarayuktamevābhimatavastunaḥ aparigraha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2484: kāminaḥ sma kurute karabhorurhāri śuṣkaruditaṃ ca sukhe 'pi” //
GK16visa03cu:2488: karabhorūḥ kāminaḥ pāṇirodhādikamavirodhitetyādi viśiṣṭaṃ yathā syāt tathā kurute sma /
GK16visa03cu:2500: vallabhasya kathādiṣu prasaṅgeṣu kenāpyārabhyamāṇeṣu tadbhāvabhāvite tadanurāganiṣovite citte sati karṇakaṇaaḍūyanādikaṃ moṭṭāyitamiti prāhuḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2507: āhuḥ kuṭṭamitaṃ nāma śiraḥ karavidhūnanam // VisSd_3.103 //
GK16visa03cu:2513: (vi, kṣa) pallavopamiti iti---abhīṣṭe priye 'dharabimbaṃ daṣṭavati sati arthāt niṣedhārthaṃ dhūyamānena kareṇa paryyakūjītyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2525: asthāne vibhramādīnāṃ vinyāso vibhramo mataḥ // VisSd_3.104 //
GK16visa03cu:2533: (vi, ka) sukumāratayeti---aṅgānāṃ vinyāso vilakṣaṇanyāsaḥ sukumāratayā komalatayā /
GK16visa03cu:2541: lalitaṃ sundaram, natu prakṛtalalitabhāvam, nartanasyaiva tattvāt /
GK16visa03cu:2547: “mā garvamudvaha kapolatale cakāsti kāntasvahastalikhitā mama mañjarīti /
GK16visa03cu:2548: anyāpi kiṃ na khalu bhājanamīdṛśīnāṃ vairī na cedbhavati vepathurantarāyaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:2553: mā garvamiti--anyanāyikāyāḥ patisaubhagyādhīnagarvaṃ sūcayantyāḥ tatsakhyāḥ tat sapatnyāmuktiriyam
GK16visa03cu:2554: he sākhi ! mama kapolatale kāntasvahastalikhitā mañjarī puṣpakalikā cakāsti śobhate iti garva mā udvahaṃ /
GK16visa03cu:2556: anyā tava sapatnī mama sakhī kiṃ kapole tanna likhatītyatrāha /
GK16visa03cu:2558: patyurbhāvātiśayadarśanena bhāvodayāt--natu lekhakasya patyuḥ pāṇeḥ, tasya garvitanāyikāvikāratvābhāvāt
GK16visa03cu:2566: “dūrāgatena kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭā novāca sā mayā kiñcit /
GK16visa03cu:2567: paryaśruṇī tu nayane tasyāḥ kathayāmbabhūvatuḥ sarvam” //
GK16visa03cu:2572: mayā kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭetyanvayaḥ sarvamitivirahādhīnaṃ tat tadduḥ khamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2579: kiñca, prāṇasamāna ! kāṅkṣitavatī svapne 'pi te saṅgamaṃ, nidrāṃ vāñchati,
GK16visa03cu:2585: he tasyāḥ prāṇasamāna ! tava virahe tava priyā śvāsān muñcatītyādi /
GK16visa03cu:2594: vallabhasya puraḥ proktaṃ maugdhyaṃ tattattvavedibhiḥ // VisSd_3.107 //
GK16visa03cu:2596: ke drumāste kva vā grāme santi kena praropitāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2628: prasādhikayā striyā ālambitam agrapādaṃ padāgram dravarāgamaśuṣkālaktakameva kācit purastrī ākṣipya ākṛṣya utsṛṣṭalīlāgatiḥ tyaktalīlāgatiḥ satī padavīmāgavākṣāt gavākṣaparyyantam alaktakāṅkāṃ tatānetyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2637: (vi, jha) avasmādeveti---iyaṃ tanvī yat punarakasmādeva jahāsa tena iti pūraṇāduttarārddhānvayaḥ
GK16visa03cu:2638: svārājyaṃ svargarājatvam iyameva svarga iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2644: kṣubhyanti prasabhamaho vināpi hetorlīlābhiḥ kimu sati kāraṇo taruṇyaḥ //
GK16visa03cu:2647: (vi, ña) kuto 'pīti---dayitasyāgre kuto 'pi hetoḥ bhayasaṃbhramaḥ vyākulatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2649: vāmorūḥ calaśapharībhirvighaṭṭitorūḥ satī trasyantī vibhramasya vilāsasyātiśayamāpa ityanvayaḥ
GK16visa03cu:2651: aho taruṇyaḥ hetorvināpi līlābhiḥ pratatamatiśayaṃ kṣubhyanti saṃcalanti kāraṇe tu sati kimu ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2654: vihāre saha kāntena krīḍitaṃ kolirucyate // VisSd_3.110 //
GK16visa03cu:2660: (vi, ṭa) vyapohitumiti---kācidunnatapīvarastanī unmanāḥ kāmodvignamanāḥ priyamurasi pīvarastanena jaghāna /
GK16visa03cu:2661: kīdṛsaṃ priyam puṣpajaṃ rajaḥ tasyā locanato mukhanilairvyapohitum apākarttum apārayantam
GK16visa03cu:2664: dṛṣṭavā darśayati vrīṅāṃ sammukhaṃ naiva paśyati /
GK16visa03cu:2665: pracchannaṃ vā bhramantaṃ vātikrāntaṃ paśyati priyam // VisSd_3.111 //

GK16visa03cu:3428: dravyaughāḥ parisaṃcitāḥ khalu mayā yasyāḥ kṛte sāṃprataṃ nīvārañjalināpi kevalamaho seyaṃ kṛtārthā tanuḥ” //

GK16visa03cu:3441: “anyāsu tāvadupamardasahāsu bhṛṅga ! lolaṃ vinodaya manaḥ sumanolatāsu /
GK16visa03cu:3442: mugdhāmajātarajasaṃ kalikāmakāle vyarthaṃ kadarthayasi kiṃ navamālikāyāḥ”
GK16visa03cu:3445: (vi, ha) anyāsviti---he bhṛṅga ! upamardasahāsu anyāsu sumanolatāsu
GK16visa03cu:3447: navamālikāyāḥ kalikāmakāle kiṃ vyarthaṃ kadarthayāsi kīdṛśīṃ mugdhāṃ mūḍhāṃ vimardasahāmityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:3458: glapayati paripāṇḍu kṣāmamasyāḥ śarīraṃ śaradija iva gharmaḥ
GK16visa03cu:3465: dāruṇo dīrghaśokaḥ asyāḥ kṣāmaṃ kṣīṇaṃ paripāṇḍu ca śarīraṃ glapayati
GK16visa03cu:3497: ete ca trayastriṃśadvyabhicāribhedā iti yaduktaṃ tadupalakṣaṇamityāha--
GK16visa03cu:3500: teṣāṃ kvacit prādhānye kvacit aprādhānye na kācita pratītikṣatiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3503: tathāhi--śṛṅgāre 'nucchidyamānatayāvasthānād ratireva sthāyiśabdavācyā hāsaḥ punarupadyamāno vyabhicāryeva /
GK16visa03cu:3515: rasa eva uttarakālam avasthā yasya paraṃ kevalaṃ tādṛśa eva bhāvaḥ ratyādisthāyitvam pratipadyate
GK16visa03cu:3516: atādṛghavasthastu na sthāyitāṃ pratipadyate iti pahaṃ padāllabhyate /
GK16visa03cu:3518: sa ca yadi tatra upakārako bhavati tadā tadīyasthāyini ābhimukhyena caraṇād vyabhicārilakṣaṇākrāntatvena tatrāpi vyabhicāripadasya yogarūḍhatvātso 'pi vyabhicārī bhavati,
GK16visa03cu:3530: rasasyaiva hi prādhānyāt iti kāvyaprakāśalikhane rasapadasya vyabhicāribhāvaparatvaṃ vyākhyānādavasīyate
GK16visa03cu:3537: (vi, ṅa) aviruddhā viruddhā veti--sthāyibhāvasya aviruddhā viruddhā vāvyabhicāribhāvā ityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:3542: na tirodhīyate sthāyī tairasau puṣyate param” // iti /
GK16visa03cu:3547: bhāvānāṃ vyabhicāribhāvānām anugāmukaḥ sambaddhaḥ sthāyī tairbhāvairna tirodhīyate na buddhyaviṣayīkriyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3558: stravasūtraṃ sarveṣāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ muktānāṃ vā yathā anugataṃ tiṣṭati tathetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3563: jugupsā vismayaścetthamaṣṭau proktāḥ śamo 'pi ca // VisSd_3.175 //
GK16visa03cu:3565: (lo, a) śāntirasasthāyibhāvasya śamasya nirākariṣyamāṇavivādasya navatve navamatayā pṛthaṅ nirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3573: raudraśaktyā tu janitaṃ cittavaiklavyaṃ bhayam // VisSd_3.178 //
GK16visa03cu:3583: ete hyeteṣvantarā utpadyamānaistaistaiviruddhairaviruddhaiśca bhāvairanucchinnāḥ pratyuta paripuṣṭā eva sahṛdayānubhavasiddhāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3590: cetovikāśo vilakṣaṇacittasaṃyogajanyaṃ jñānamupahāsyatājñānaparyyavasannaṃ yato mukhavikāśarūpaṃ smitaṃ jāyate /
GK16visa03cu:3595: raudro 'pakarttuṃ kṣamaḥ; tasya śaktyā sāmarthyena vaikalyaṃ bhāviduḥ khajñānapalāyanahetuḥ
GK16visa03cu:3599: kathamasya etādṛśo doṣa ityevaṃ vismayena janitā /
GK16visa03cu:3623: sukhaduḥ khādibhāvaistadbhāvasya ratyādisattāyāḥ bhāvanam udvodhanam ato ratyādiko bhāva ityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:3626: bhāvairātmaniṣṭaiḥ kāvyaniṣṭairvā tasya rāmāderanukāryyasya yo bhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ tasya bhāvanaṃ śravaṇaṃ darśanaṃ vā /
GK16visa03cu:3630: bībhatso 'dbhuta ityaṣṭau rasāḥ śāntastathā mataḥ // VisSd_3.182 //
GK16visa03cu:3632: (lo, ī) evaṃ saparikarasya rasasya svarūpamuktadiśā nirūpayitumuddiśati /
GK16visa03cu:3635: śravye mahākāvyādau śānto 'pi navamo raso 'stīti tasya pṛthaṅ nirdeśaḥ na samyaṅ nāṭyopayogitvābhāvāt
GK16visa03cu:3637: evañca niratiśayasukhāsvādanalakṣaṇatvāt eka eva raso na viśeṣāḥ santi iti vādināṃ matamapyapāstam
GK16visa03cu:3638: ata evoktam”yaktāraṇaṃ ca kāryyañca ye ca syurvyabhicāriṇaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3654: manmathasyāgamanaṃ prāptiḥ tadeva heturyasya tādṛśaḥ, kāmina eva śṛṅgārarasodvodhāt /
GK16visa03cu:3660: te ca svanāyakā eva paranāyakasya tu paroḍhāvat śṛṅgārabhāsālambanameva /
GK16visa03cu:3663: sambhoga eva maraṇasya jātaprāyamātrasyaiva varṇanīyatvāt vāstavamaraṇasyaiva tyāgaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3667: āṅpūrvāt ṛgatau ityasya dhātoḥ ghañantāt āraśabdasya vyutpāditatvāt tatra manmathodbhedasya viśeṣanirddeśādubhayorapyetadrasaprakṛtibhūtayoḥ strīpuṃsayoḥ parasparaṃ prauḍhatarānurāgahetukatvamasya sūcitam /
GK16visa03cu:3670: eṣāṃ rasānāṃ varṇadaivatakathanaṃ nāṭakādiṣu vidheyāvighnahetukeṣu naṭasaṃpādyapūjādiṣu pratyūhyate
GK16visa03cu:3677: atroktasvarūpaḥ patiḥ, uktasvarūpā ca bālā ālambanavibhāvau /
GK16visa03cu:3683: vipralambho 'tha saṃbhoga ityeṣa dvividho mataḥ // VisSd_3.186 //
GK16visa03cu:3685: yatra tu ratiḥ prakṛṣṭā nābhīṣṭamupaiti vipralambho 'sā /
GK16visa03cu:3692: tena māninyāmanukūlatāyāṃ prāptāyāmapi nāyakasya vipralambha eva /
GK16visa03cu:3694: (lo, ū) yatra tviti---ratiruktaṇṭhā prakṛṣṭā prakṛṣṭatāṃ yātiratiprakarṣasya nāyikāniṣṭatve nāyakaṃ nāyakapakṣe ca nāyikāṃ nopaiti na prāptotītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3700: daśāviśeṣo yo 'prāptau pūrvarāgaḥ sa ucyate // VisSd_3.188 //
GK16visa03cu:3707: sa ca śravaṇāt darśanāt vā bhavatītyuktatvāt
GK16visa03cu:3711: indrajāle ca citre ca sākṣātsvaṣne ca darśanam // VisSd_3.189 //
GK16visa03cu:3714: (vi, ṭha) śravaṇaṃ tviti---dūtādimukhāt śravaṇam indrajālasvaprābhyāṃ cakṣuṣā vā darśanamityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:3718: unmādo 'tha vyādhirjaḍatā mṛtiriti daśātra kāmadaśāḥ // VisSd_3.190 //
GK16visa03cu:3733: tathā ca vyādhijvarāditi yaduktaṃ prāk tadīyādipadagrāhyamidaṃ muktamiti bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:3737: “premārdrāḥ praṇayaspṛśaḥ paricayādudrāḍharāgodayā- stāstā mugdhadṛśo nisargamadhurāśceṣṭā bhaveyurmayi /
GK16visa03cu:3738: yāsvantaḥ karaṇasya bāhyakaraṇavyāpārarodhī kṣaṇā- dāśaṃsāparikalpitāsvapi bhavatyānandasāndro layaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:3742: mukhadṛśo mālatyāstāstāḥ anyādṛśaḥ ceṣṭā mayi bhaveyuḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3748: yāsu ceṣṭāsu āśaṃsāyāmicchāyāṃ parikalpitāsvapi antaḥ karaṇasya ānandena sāndro vyāpto layaḥ līnatā kṣaṇādbhavati /
GK16visa03cu:3753: (lo, ṛ) premārdrā iti---darśanādigato bhāvavyañjakaḥ kaścana cittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ prema tatpūrvako vaśīkāraḥ praṇayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3759: iti cintākulaḥ kānto nidrāṃ naiti niśīthinīm” //
GK16visa03cu:3774: “tribhāgaśeṣāsu niśāsu ca kṣamaṃ nimīlya netre sahasā vyabudhyana /
GK16visa03cu:3779: pārvatīsakhyā vijayāyā jaṭilaveśapracchannaṃ maheśa prati uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:3780: bhāgatraye jāgaritatvāt śeṣāvaśiṣṭāsu niśāsu netre nimīlya mīlayitvā iyaṃ sahasā vyabudhyata
GK16visa03cu:3781: kīdṛśī asatye harasya kaṇṭhe 'rpitabāhubandhanā satī he nīlakaṇṭha !
GK16visa03cu:3786: “pāṇḍu kṣāmaṃ vadanaṃ hṛdayaṃ sarasaṃ tavālasaṃ ca vapuḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3789: (lo, ṝ) pāṇiḍvati---parakṣetre na chedanīyo rogaḥ kṣetriyarogaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3794: (vi, da) pāṇḍukṣāmāmiti---mālatyāṃ tadvirahāvasthāṃ pṛcchantyā lavaṅgikāyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:3795: he sakhi ! tava hṛdantaḥ kṣetriyarogam asmin kṣetre śarīre acikitsyaṃ rogaṃ pāṇḍukṣāmavadanādikaṃ karttṛ āvedayatītyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3800: dīho ṇīsāsaharo eso sāhei jīaitti paraṃ” //
GK16visa03cu:3804: dīrgho niḥ śvāsabhara eṣa sādhayati jīvatīti param /
GK16visa03cu:3807: ato dīrghaniśvāsa eva iyaṃ jīvati sādhayati ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3822: “śephālikāṃ vidalitāmavalokya tanvī prāṇān kathaṃcidapi dhārayituṃ prabhūtā /
GK16visa03cu:3823: ākarṇya saṃprati rutaṃ caraṇāyudhānāṃ kiṃ vā bhaviṣyati na vedmi tapasvinī
GK16visa03cu:3827: (vi, pa) śephālikāmiti---vidalitāṃ patitakusumāṃ kiñcidavaśiṣṭāyāṃ rātrau tadvidalanāt, kadācittadānīmapi nāyakāgamanasaṃbhāvanayā prāṇadhāraṇam /
GK16visa03cu:3829: prātaḥ kāla eveti tatra maraṇasaṃbhāvanayā sakhyā viṣādoktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:3832: (lo, ḷ) śephālikāmiti---śephālikāvidalanena niśīthakālaḥ sūcitaḥ tapasvinī śocyā /
GK16visa03cu:3835: “rolambāḥ paripūrayantu harito jhaṃkārakolāhalair mandaṃ mandamupaitu candanavanījāto nabhasvānapi
GK16visa03cu:3836: mādyantaḥ kalayantu cūtaśikhare kelīpikāḥ pañcamaṃ prāṇāḥ satvaramaśmasārakaṭhinā gacchantu gacchantvamī” //
GK16visa03cu:3859: eṣa ca prakāraḥ karuṇaḥ vipralambhaviṣaya iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3868: unmādo mūrcchā mṛtirityetāḥ smaradaśā daśaiva syu” /
GK16visa03cu:3871: ādau vācyaḥ striyā rāgaḥ puṃsaḥ paścāttadiṅgitaiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3885: nīlī kusumbhaṃ mañjiṣṭhā pūrvarāgo 'pi ca tridhā // VisSd_3.195 //
GK16visa03cu:3896: (vi, ma) na cātiśobhate iti---avispaṣṭatvāt na cātiśobhate ityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:3897: śrīrāmasītayoriti---śrīrāmasya dhīrodāttatvāt purūvasa ivātyantapralāpābhāvena nātiśobhate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3900: mānaḥ kopaḥ sa tu dvedhā praṇayerṣyāsamudbhavaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3904: praṇayena īrṣyayā vā samudbhavo yasya tādṛśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3906: dvayoḥ praṇayamānaḥ syāt pramode sumahatyapi // VisSd_3.198 //
GK16visa03cu:3907: premṇaḥ kuṭilagāmitvāt kopo yaḥ kāraṇaṃ vinā /
GK16visa03cu:3908: dvayoriti nāyakasya nāyikāyāśca ubhayośca praṇayamāno varṇanīyaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3919: praṇayamānena alīkaprasuptaṃ nāyakaṃ cumbitvā tenāślādhitāyā nāyikāyāstaṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:3920: he alīkaprasupta ! he vinimīlitākṣa ! he subhaga ! mayā te tava
GK16visa03cu:3921: gaṇḍaparicumbanayā pulakitamarthāt tavāṅgameva mamāvakāśo mama sthityavakāśaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3924: atra ca”prāgāmantritamasakṛdi”ti sūtreṇa te ityasya asambhavo nāśaṅkanīyaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3933: etaccirāyitāyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ sakalāmapi śayyāmāvṛtya mithyāprasuptasya nāyakasya gaṇḍaṃ paricumbya tasyā vacanam /
GK16visa03cu:3939: atra pārvatīṃ tyaktvā sandhyāvandanāya gate maheśe pārvatyā māne tasya tadbhaṅgapravṛttau tatra hi “sandhyayā kamalayonikanyayā yā tanuḥ
GK16visa03cu:3941: seyamastamudayañca sevate tena mānini ! mamātra gauravam //
GK16visa03cu:3957: atra ko mallaḥ kaściraṃ soḍhuṃ samarthaḥ na jñāyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3959: anunayaparyantāsahatve tvasya na vipralambhabhedatā, kintu saṃbhogasañcāryākhyabhāvatvam /
GK16visa03cu:3966: “bhrūbhaṅge racite 'pi dṛṣṭiradhikaṃ sotkaṇṭhamudvīkṣate ruddhāyāmapi vāci sammitamidaṃ dagdhānanaṃ jāyate /
GK16visa03cu:3967: kārkaśyaṃ gamite 'pi cetasi tanū romāñcamālambate dṛṣṭe nirvahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ mānasya tasmiñjane” //
GK16visa03cu:3970: (vi, ṣa) mayā bhrūbhaṅge racite 'pi mama dṛṣṭistaṃ priyaṃ
GK16visa03cu:3972: ityādirītyā tasmin jane priyatame dṛṣṭe sati kathaṃ mānasya nirvahaṇaṃ nirvāho bhaviṣyatītyanvayaḥ
GK16visa03cu:3976: “ekasmiñśayane parāṅmukhatayā vītottaraṃ tāmyator anyonyasya hṛdi sthite
GK16visa03cu:3995: yathā mama---”sakhi ! tvaṃ kiṃ brūṣe na bhavati madanyatra nirataḥ patirme dhūrtto 'sāvṛjurasi na jānāsi tamimam /
GK16visa03cu:3996: samudratyāgārādaparayuvatīsaṅganirato mayā dṛṣṭaḥ svapne tadalamiha saṃprītikathayā //
GK16visa03cu:4009: yadyapi gopāyituṃ śaknoṣi tathāpi vimardetthāṅgarāgagandhaḥ kena prakāreṇa vārayituṃ śakya iti vākyārthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4014: āvegādavadhīritaḥ priyatamaḥ tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ tat kṣaṇād mābhūt supta ivetyamandavalitagrīvaṃ punarvokṣitaḥ //
GK16visa03cu:4016: “parasaktāsaktaḥ sakhi ! mama sa yat cāṭu kurute samasto 'sau
GK16visa03cu:4018: tadā tāṃ tu dhyāyan sa khalu kitavaḥ kelisamaye muhustasya nāmnā nanu rahasi sambodhayati mām //
GK16visa03cu:4021: sāma bhedo 'tha dānaṃ ca natyupekṣe rasāntaram /
GK16visa03cu:4022: tadbhaṅgāya patiḥ kuryāt ṣaḍupāyāniti kramāt // VisSd_3.201 //
GK16visa03cu:4024: dānaṃ vyājena bhūṣādeḥ pādayoḥ patanaṃ natiḥ // VisSd_3.202 //
GK16visa03cu:4054: gacchannityatra upekṣā etāḥ pañca sūcitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4055: ebhirupāyairasya mānabhaṅgābhāve 'pi na tadupāyahīniḥ tasyāmajātodvegarūpasahakāriviraheṇa phalānutpādanāt /
GK16visa03cu:4057: rasāntarantūhyamiti--harṣād yathā---”cirapravāsāt suhṛdi prayāte yastatra harṣo mithunasya jātaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4061: bhayād yathā---”pravṛtte mānabhaṅgāya patyau nāga upāgataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4062: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā kaṇṭhe patiṃ jagrāha māninī //
GK16visa03cu:4072: (vi, kha) vipralambhasya pūrvarāgamānapravāsakaruṇarūpacāturvidhyasya uktatvāt pūrvarāgaṃ mānñca samāpya pravāsamāha---atha pravāsa iti /
GK16visa03cu:4077: mṛtiśceti kramājjñeyā daśa smaradaśā iha // VisSd_3.206 //
GK16visa03cu:4096: patyau pravāsasthe karatale gaṇḍaṃ kṛtvā cintayantīṃ prati kasyaciduktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4098: bhāvī bhavanbhūta iti tridhā syāttatra kāryajaḥ // VisSd_3.208 //
GK16visa03cu:4103: (vi, ṅa) pravāsasya kāryyāt śāpāt ityādi traividhyasyoktatvāt kāryyajameva trividhamāha--bhāvīti
GK16visa03cu:4108: “yāmaḥ sundari, yāhi pāntha, dayite śokaṃ vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ, śokaste gamane kuto mama tato vāṣpaṃ kathaṃ muñcasi /
GK16visa03cu:4109: śīghraṃ na vrajasīti māṃ gamayituṃ kasmādiyaṃ te tvarā, bhūyānasya saha tvayā jigamiṣorjovasya me saṃbhramaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4122: tvayā saha jigamiṣoḥ asya me jīvasya bhūyān saṃbhramastvaretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4125: tava gamane mama kutaḥ śokaḥ jīvanābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4129: mayi kṛtakapremakavastaba na khalu kadācid gamanam /
GK16visa03cu:4131: tatrāvaśyaṃbhāvini gamane hasasotpanne eṣāmapi niryāṇa ākulībhāvo nivarttatāmiti /
GK16visa03cu:4134: “prasthānaṃ vabayaiḥ kṛtaṃ, priyasakhairastraijastraṃ gataṃ, dhṛtyā na kṣaṇamāsitaṃ, vyavasitaṃ cittena gantuṃ puraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4135: yātuṃ niścitacetasi priyatame sarve samaṃ prasthitā gantavye sati jīvita !
GK16visa03cu:4141: he jīvita ! priyatame yātuṃ niścitacetasi sati tavāpi gantavye
GK16visa03cu:4146: prasthānaṃ yātrā bahudinavyāpakatadvārttayā kārśyena valayabhraṃśaḥ gataṃ calitam /
GK16visa03cu:4148: tacca maraṇahetuśokādiduḥ khe 'pyaśrupātena tadduḥ khasya kiñcidupaśamāt /
GK16visa03cu:4155: atra pūrvarāgoktānāmabhilāṣādīnāmatroktānāṃ cāṅgāsauṣṭhavādīnāmapi daśānānubhayeṣāmapyubhayatra sambhave 'pi cirantanaprasiddhyā vivicya pratipādanam /
GK16visa03cu:4162: tatra ca devena urvaśyā haraṇameva daiva utpātaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4171: tathā ca tatra vipralambha eva ityuktvā prathamaṃ karuṇaḥ paścāttu vipralambha ityabhiyuktānāṃ mataṃ darśayitumāha--kiñceti /
GK16visa03cu:4173: yathā pūrvarāgamānapravāsarūpā viśeṣāstathā maraṇasyāpi viśeṣasya sambhavādetadbhedena pravāsabhinnamapītyarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:4177: etadgranthakṛtaḥ kuvalayāśvacarite ca yuvatermadālasāyastathābhāve kuvalayāśvasya śarīrāntareṇa labhye ajendumatīvṛttāntavat /
GK16visa03cu:4180: punaralabhye śarīrāntareṇa bālabhye tu karuṇākhya eva rasaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4182: prathamaṃ tu karuṇa eva, ityabhiyuktā manyante /
GK16visa03cu:4183: yaccātra “saṅgamapratyāśānantaramapi bhavato vipralambhaśṛṅgārasya pravāsākhyo bheda eva” iti kecidāhuḥ, tadanye
GK16visa03cu:4187: ayamāśayaḥ---yathā bhavadbhirekadeśasthayorviyogo virahākhyaḥ videśasthayoḥ pravāsākhya iti īṣadbhinnadharmayoge 'pi bhedaḥ svīkṛtaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4188: asmābhistasminneva śarīre viyogaḥ--pravāsākhyaḥ, śarīrāntare tu karuṇa iti bahutarabhinnayoge iti kā kṣatiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4189: yattu kaiścid abhilāṣapravāserṣyāvirahaśāpahetukatvena pañcadhā vipralambhaityuktam tatra saṅgamaprāgabhāvarūpo 'bhilāṣaḥ pūrvarāga eva /
GK16visa03cu:4190: ekadeśasthayorapi gurvādivaśād saṅgamoparodhasvarūpaḥ virahaśca; yadi kanyāviṣayastadā pūrvarāga eva /
GK16visa03cu:4191: yadā tu paroḍhāviṣayaḥ tadā rasābhāvasattvāt na śṛṅgararasabhedaḥ, yadi tūpabhuktanāyikāviṣayastadāsa prāvāsākhyabhedāntaḥ pātaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4193: atra eva maharṣiṇā pravāsadaśadaśālakṣaṇe”pūrvānubhava jā jñeyā daśa
GK16visa03cu:4199: yadi caikadeśasthayorna pravāsastat kathaya kiyati yojane kiyati vā kośe
GK16visa03cu:4201: kathaṃ vā dūradeśasthayornaladamayantyoḥ pradyumnaprabhāvatyorhaṃsamukhā guṇaśravaṇānantaraṃ purvaṃrāgastayā cakavākayostṛṇamātravyavadhāne 'pi
GK16visa03cu:4217: kadācit ekaikena kadācittūbhayena nāpi darśanādikaṃ kriyata ityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:4218: tena ekaikasya darśanādau api sambhogo boddhyaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4221: digdho 'mṛtena ca viṣeṇa ca pakṣmalākṣyā gāḍhaṃ nikhāta iva me hṛdaye
GK16visa03cu:4227: ayameka eva dhīraiḥ kathitaḥ saṃbhogaśṛṅgāraḥ // VisSd_3.211 //
GK16visa03cu:4232: “yatkiñcilloke śuci medhyamujjvalaṃ darśanīyaṃ vā tatsarvaṃ śṛṅgāreṇopamīyate (upayujyate ca)” iti /
GK16visa03cu:4235: (vi, ṭa) vācyaṃ śucimedhyamiti---śuci śuddhaṃ vastrādi, medhyaṃ pavitram anyad vā yat taduddīpanavibhāvarūpatayā vācyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4237: śṛṅgāreṇa hetunā upamīyate taduddīpanatayā upamīyate upasthāpyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4250: kaṣāyite hi vastrādau bhūyān rāgo vivardhate” // iti /
GK16visa03cu:4252: tatra pūrvarāgānantaraṃ saṃbhogo yathā kumārasambhave pārvatīparameśvarayoḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4263: “kṣemaṃ te nanu pakṣmalākṣi !- kisaaṃ khemaṃ mahaṅgaṃ diḍhaṃ, etādṛkkṛśatā kutaḥ tuha puṇo puṭṭhaṃ sarīraṃ jado /
GK16visa03cu:4264: kenāhaṃ pṛthulaḥ praye !- paṇaiṇīdehassa sammelaṇāt, tvattaḥ subhru ! na kapi me, jai idaṃ khemaṃ kudo pucchasi” //
GK16visa03cu:4269: jai iti--- yadi idaṃ kṣemaṃ kutaḥ pṛcchasi /
GK16visa03cu:4270: ayamarthaḥ---yadāhameva praṇayinī kimiti māṃ parihṛtya dūraṃ gato 'si
GK16visa03cu:4273: saṃyogaviyogau ca parasparāyattatārūpau tena dūtipraṣaṇādeḥ saṃbhogaviṣayatvam /
GK16visa03cu:4279: (vi, ḍa) kṣemaṃ te nanu ityādi---ime dampatyoruktipratyuktī /
GK16visa03cu:4280: tatra pravāsādagatasya patyuḥ saṃskṛtoktiḥ; tat patnyāḥ prākṛtoktiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4284: puṭṭhamiti---tava punaḥ śarīraṃ puṣṭaṃ yata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4285: paṇaiṇīti---praṇayinyā mama dehasya saṃbhiśraṇāt saṃkocāt kṛśīkaraṇādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4286: etāvat kālaṃ tava vaideśyāt, niścitena tavānurāgeṇa yato 'haṃ kṛśā;
GK16visa03cu:4287: ato māṃ kṛśāṃ kṛtvā manmāsena tava śarīraṃ puṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4289: he subhru ! tvattaḥ kāpi na me kāpi puṣṭiḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4290: jai idamiti yadīdaṃ tadā kṣemaṃ kutaḥ pṛcchasi /
GK16visa03cu:4292: matkārśye 'pi tava paṣṭyā ca mayi tavānurāgābhāvenaiva puṣṭiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4293: anurāgasattve tu madvirahāt kārśyaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4295: tatra ca maraṇānantaraṃ jīvane mahāśvetāpuṇḍarīkayoḥ sambhoge /
GK16visa03cu:4313: (lo, ai) hāsya iti---vikṛtād vikiyāyuktāda vāgveśaceṣṭādeḥ kuhakākhyavañcanāprayogācca hāsyaraso bhavediti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4319: kiñcillakṣyadvijaṃ tatra hasitaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ // VisSd_3.218 //
GK16visa03cu:4321: apahasitaṃ sāstrākṣaṃ vikṣiptāṅgaṃ ca bhavatyatihasitam // VisSd_3.219 //
GK16visa03cu:4335: kāyocchvasanadṛṣṭisaṅkocādayo harṣāvahitthādayaśca anubhāvavyabhicāriṇaḥ anuktā api sāmarthyāllabhyāḥ
GK16visa03cu:4339: yasya hāsaḥ sa ceta kvāpi sākṣānnaiva nibadhyate /
GK16visa03cu:4345: (vi, ta) atra cottamādiṣu ya upahāsakastasya smitādikamunneyam /
GK16visa03cu:4348: abhedeneti---sa upahāsakaḥ sāmājikaiḥ vibhāvādisādhāraṇyāt yataḥ abhedena pratīyate tato hāsyaraso 'yamanumīyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4353: tataśca svādanākhyena vyāpāreṇa hāsyarasa āsvādyata iti pūrvāparagranthaniṣkarṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4368: “vipine kva jaṭānibandhanaṃ tava cedaṃ kva manoharaṃ vapuḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4369: anayorghaṭanā vidheḥ sphuṭaṃ nanu khaḍgena śirīṣakarttanam” //
GK16visa03cu:4377: tatra bandhuviyoge yathā---”hā mātastvaritāsi kutra kimidaṃ hā devatāḥ kvāśiṣaḥ dhik prāṇān patito 'śanirhutavahaste 'ṅgeṣu dagdhe dṛśau /
GK16visa03cu:4378: itthaṃ ghargharamadhyaruddhakaruṇāpaurāṅganānāṃ giraḥ citrasthānapi rodayanti śatadhā kurvanti bhittīrapi //
GK16visa03cu:4379: “idaṃ madālasāyāṃ mṛtāyāṃ purastrīṇāṃ rodanasya kenāpi kathanam /
GK16visa03cu:4380: vittanāśe yathā-”kiṃ karomi kka gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ kka vrajāmyaham /
GK16visa03cu:4386: vipralambhe ratiḥ sthāyī punaḥ saṃbhogahetukaḥ // VisSd_3.226 //
GK16visa03cu:4407: narakaripuṇā sārdhaṃ teṣāṃ sabhīmakirīṭinā- mayamahamasṛṅmedomāṃsaiḥ karomi diśāṃ balim” //
GK16visa03cu:4412: idaṃ svayaṃ mṛtasya mama pituḥ śiracchedarūpaṃ gurupātakaṃ yairudāyudhairmanujapaśubhirnirmayādairbhavaddhiḥ kṛtamanumataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vā narakāsurasya ripuṇā śrīkṛṣṇena sārddhaṃ sabhīmakirīṭināṃ teṣāṃ medomāṃsaiḥ diśāṃ diksthitabhūtānāṃ balimayamaham etatkṣaṇavartto ahaṃ karomītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4415: narakaripupadopādānāt narakahetupātakahantāraṃ gurupātakakāriṇañca haniṣyāmīti sūcanāt matkrodhe jagadeva naṅkṣyati iti sūcitam /
GK16visa03cu:4434: sa ca dānadarmayuddhairdayayā ca samanvitaścaturdhā syāt // VisSd_3.234 //
GK16visa03cu:4435: sa ca vīro dānavīro dharmavīro yuddhavīro dayāvīraśceti caturvidhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4441: sarvasvatyāgādibhiranubhāvairanubhāvito, harṣadhṛtyādibhaiḥ saṃcāribhiḥ puṣṭiṃ nīto dānavīratāṃ bhajate /
GK16visa03cu:4444: (vi, pa) tyāgaḥ saptasamudreti---saptasamudrāvṛttayā mahyā nirvyājadānaparyyantaḥ tyāga ityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:4449: “rājyaṃ ca vasu dehaśca bhāryā bhrātṛsutāśca ye /
GK16visa03cu:4450: yacca loke mamāyattaṃ tad dharmāya sadodyatam” //
GK16visa03cu:4452: bho laṅkeśvara ! dīyatāṃ janakajā rāmaḥ svayaṃ yācate ko 'yaṃ te mativibhramaḥ smara nayaṃ nādyāpi kiṃcidratam /
GK16visa03cu:4453: naivaṃ cet kharadūṣaṇatriśirasāṃ kaṇṭhāsṛjā paṅkilaḥ pattrī naiṣa sahiṣyate mama dhanurjyābandhabandhūkṛtaḥ”
GK16visa03cu:4457: rāmo rāmanāmnā khyāto vālihantā svayaṃ yācate /
GK16visa03cu:4460: mayā saha sandherupāyaḥ ko 'pi na gata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4461: naivaṃ cet sītā na dīyate cet tadā mama dhanuḥ jyābandhasya bandhūkṛta eṣa patrī vāṇo na sahiṣyate
GK16visa03cu:4465: “śirāmukhaiḥ syandata eva raktamadyāpi dehe mama māṃsamasti /
GK16visa03cu:4466: tṛptiṃ na paśyāmi tavāpi tāvat kiṃ bhakṣaṇāttvaṃ virato garutman ! /
GK16visa03cu:4471: garuḍena bhakṣyamāṇaṃ nāgaṃ paritrātuṃ tadbhakṣaṇāya ātmadehamarpitavatastadbhakṣitabahumāṃsasya jīmūtavāhanasyātṛptaṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4472: he garutman ! adyāpi mama dehe māṃsamasti /
GK16visa03cu:4473: atra hetumāha---mama kīdṛśasya śirāmukheṃ raktaṃ syandata eva /
GK16visa03cu:4474: ato yadyapi bahūni māṃsāni bhakṣitāni tathāpi tṛptimātmani na paśyāmi
GK16visa03cu:4486: (vi, bha) bhayānakānubhāveṣu pulakaḥ kiñcid aṅgeṣu romāñcaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4502: ārttaḥ paryastanetraḥ prakaṭitadaśanaḥ pretaraṅkaḥ karaṅkādaṅkasthādasthiṃsthaṃ sthapuṭagatamapi kravyamadhyagramatti” //
GK16visa03cu:4507: utkṛtyeti---karālārādhanāya gatasya mādhavasya śavaṃ bhuñjānaṃ pretaṃ dṛṣṭvā uktiriyam
GK16visa03cu:4510: aṅkasthāt śavāt asthisaṃsthaṃ sthapuṭagatamapi kravyaṃmāṃsaṃ prakaṭitadaśanaḥ sannavyagraṃ yathā syāttathātti /
GK16visa03cu:4511: kiṃ kṛtvā prathamaṃ kṛttiṃ carmma utkṛtyokṛtya /
GK16visa03cu:4512: athānantaraṃ aṃse bhujamūle sphici nitambe pṛṣṭe ca /
GK16visa03cu:4516: māṃsāni kīdṛśāni pṛthunā ucchothena tatphullatayā bhūyāṃsi bahūni tathā atidurgandhīni /
GK16visa03cu:4527: guṇānāṃ tasya mahimā bhaveduddīpanaṃ punaḥ // VisSd_3.243 //
GK16visa03cu:4539: dordaṇḍeti--rāmeṇa dhanuṣi bhagne tacchabdaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4540: dordaṇḍenāñcitasya utkṣiptasya candraśekharadhanurdaṇḍasyāvabhaṅgena udgato jhaṅkāradhvaniḥ aho 'dyāpi na viśrāmyati /
GK16visa03cu:4542: āryyasya rāmasya bālacaritānāṃ prastāvanāyāḥ prakhyāpanāyāḥ ḍiṇḍimo vādyaviśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4543: punaḥ kīdṛśaḥ--drāksahasā paryyastābhyāmutkṣiptābhyāṃ kapālasaṃpuṭābhyāṃ punarmilito brahmāṇḍabhāṇḍasya caṇḍaśabdāt utphulya
GK16visa03cu:4551: evaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭatayā milati jāyamāne brahmaṇḍabhāṇḍodare bhrāmyan piṇḍitaḥ piṇḍībhūtaḥ caṇḍimā caṇḍatvaṃ yasyeti jhaṅkāradhvanorviśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa03cu:4557: yattu nirvedasya sthāyibhāvatāvalambanena śāntarasasvīkāraḥ gṛtastadayuktam , tasya svādyamānarūpatvāt saṃcāribhāvasyaiva nāṭyatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:4563: (vi, ra) anityatvādinā ityatra ādipadāt iṣṭaviyogādinā vairāgyaparigrahaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4571: “rathyāntaścaratastathā dhṛtajarat kanthālavasyādhvagaiḥ satrāsaṃ ca sakautukaṃ ca sadayaṃ dṛṣṭasya tairnāgaraiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4572: nirvyājīkṛtacitsudhārasamudā nidrāyamāṇasya me niḥśaṅkaḥ karaṭaḥ kadā karapuṭībhikṣāṃ viluṇṭhiṣyati”
GK16visa03cu:4577: nirbojīkṛtayā citsudhārasamudā jñānāmṛtaharṣeṇa nidrāyamāṇasya me kadā karapuṭībhikṣāṃ karaṭaḥ kāko viluṇṭhiṣyati /
GK16visa03cu:4579: mama kīdṛśasya, bhikṣāviluṇṭhanādibhayābhāvāt niḥ śaṅkaṃ carataḥ rathyāntaḥ nagararājamārgamadhye carataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4581: ataḥ taiḥ rathyāsthaiḥ adhvagairnāgaraiḥ kanthādiviparītadarśanāt satrāsañca sakautukañca daridrāvasthādarśanāt sadayañca dṛṣṭasya /
GK16visa03cu:4590: nirbojīkṛto yo 'sau citjñānameva sudhārasaḥ tena prakāśena yā mut
GK16visa03cu:4593: nirbojīkṛtasyāyamarthaḥ-- nirgataṃ bījaṃ saṃsārakāraṇam avidyākhyaṃ yasmāt prakāśādityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:4594: nirgataṃ bījam ātmaprakāśajñānakāraṇaṃ mano yatra sa nirbojaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4600: dayāvīrādau hi nāgānandadau jīmūtavāhanāderantarā malayavatyādyanurāgāderante ca vidyādharacakravatitvādyāpterdarśanādahaṅkāropaśamo na dṛśyate /
GK16visa03cu:4604: “na yatra duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ na cintā na dveṣarāgau na ca kacidicchā /
GK16visa03cu:4605: rasaḥ sa śāntaḥ kathito manīndraiḥ sarveṣu bhāveṣu samapramāṇaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4612: atra ca iti---mokṣāvasthīyaśāntaḥ sa evayato rasatāmetīti
GK16visa03cu:4617: sarveṣu loṣṭrāśmakāñcanādiṣu bhāveṣu padārtheṣu gamaṃ tulyaṃ pramāṇaṃ jñānaṃ yatra /
GK16visa03cu:4619: ityevaṃrūpasya śāntasya mokṣāvasthāyāmevātmasvarūpāpattilakṣaṇāyāṃ prādurbhāvāttatra sañcāryādīnāmabhāvāt kathaṃ rasatvamityucyate--
GK16visa03cu:4621: (lo, ū) ātmeti---ātmasvarūpasya āpattiḥ prāptiḥ lakṣaṇaṃ svarūpaṃ yasyāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4623: yuktaviyuktadaśāyāmavasthito yaḥ śamaḥ sa eva yataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4624: rasatāmeti tadasmin sañcāryādeḥ sthitiśca na viruddhā // VisSd_3.250 //
GK16visa03cu:4631: tena śāntasya vaiṣayikasukhabhinnaṃ tṛṣṇākṣayādhīnaṃ sukhamastyeva ityuktam /
GK16visa03cu:4633: (lo, ṛ) yukteti---tatra viṣayebhyaḥ parāvṛtya sākṣāt kartavye brahmaṇi mano nidhāya varttamānatvacintāsantānavān yuktaḥ, yasya ca yogajadharmasahakṛtena manasā, jijñāsitavastusākṣātkāro jāyate, yaśca bhūtvendriyajayī aṇimādyaḥ kāyasiddhīrdūraśraṇādyā hyatīndriyāṇi sve sve viṣaye sahattvasannikarṣādisahakāranirapekṣāṇi varttante, evaṃ yuktaviyuktāvasthāyāmityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4648: kadā vārāṇasyāmiha suradhunīrodhasi vasan vasānaḥ kaupīnaṃ śirasi nidadhāno 'ñjalipuṭam /
GK16visa03cu:4649: aye gaurīnātha ! tripurahara ! śaṃbho ! trinayana ! prasīdeti krośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān” //
GK16visa03cu:4654: kadā vārāṇasyāmiti--iha vārāṇasyāṃ suradhunyā gaṅgāyā rodhasi tīre pulin vā vasan ahaṃ kaupīnadvayañca vasānaḥ śirasyañjalipuṭaṃ dadhānaśca aye gaurīnāthetyādinā'krośan ca kadā divasān nimeṣamiva neṣyāmītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4655: atra kaupīnādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ sukhādirāhityaprāptyā sarvāhaṅkārarāhityalābhād devaviṣayaraterapi śāntarasatvaprāptiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4658: sphuṭaṃ camatkāritayā vatsalaṃ ca rasaṃ viduḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4662: (vi, ha) vatsalatāsneha iti---na caivaṃ dayāvīratvaprasaktiriti vācyam , ātmāpakāreṇāpi paropacikīrṣāprayojakadharmaviśeṣasya dayātvāt
GK16visa03cu:4663: sukhasambandhini anurāgaviśeṣasya ca snehatvāt iti anayorbhedāt /
GK16visa03cu:4676: “yadāha dhātryā prathamoditaṃ vaco yayau tadīyāmavalambya cāṅgalīm /
GK16visa03cu:4677: abhūcca namraḥ praṇipātaśikṣayā piturmudaṃ tena tatāna sor'bhakaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4680: (vi, kṣa) yadāha dhātryeti---uditasya uccāritasya prathamaṃ prathamoditamiti”rājadantādisamāsāt”
GK16visa03cu:4681: dātryā uditaśca nārāyaṇetyādiśabdaśca prathamaṃ”nā”ityādi yadvacaḥ raghurāha tadīyāṃ dhātrīyām aṅgulimavalambya yacca yayau praṇipātaśikṣayā yacca namno 'bhūt, tena karmaṇā piturdilīpasya mudaṃ tatāna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4688: bhayānakena śāntena tathā vīrarasaḥ smṛtaḥ // VisSd_3.256 //
GK16visa03cu:4695: unmādādirna tu sthāyī na pātre syairyameti yat /
GK16visa03cu:4700: (lo, e) nanūnmādānāṃ sthāyitvamavalambya kathamanye 'pi rasā noktāḥ ityāśaṅkyāha--kuto 'pīti /
GK16visa03cu:4710: rasanādrasā iti---rasanam āsvādanaṃ tadrūpasādṛśyāt gauṇyā lakṣaṇayā rasapadārtha ityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:4713: (lo, ai) nanu yadi rasātmakaṃ vākyameva kāvyaṃ tāha
GK16visa03cu:4727: udvuddhamātraḥ jñātamātraḥ; natu viśiṣya niścita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4728: sthāyī sthāyibhāvavad vācyo natu sthiratāmāpanna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4729: nanu sañcāriṇastāvadrasanadharmasambandhina eva, tataśca sañcārisattve 'vaśyaṃ rasasattvam
GK16visa03cu:4730: tathā ca dhvanireva rasa ityataḥ kathaṃ tatra bhāvadhvanitvamityata āha---na bhāvo raseti
GK16visa03cu:4732: tatra yathāpradhānatayā rasastiṣṭhati evaṃ rase 'pi apradhānatayā
GK16visa03cu:4735: ityuktadiśā paramālocanayā paramaviśrāntisthānena rasena sahaiva vartamānā api rājānugatavivāhapravṛttabhṛtyavadāpātato yatra pradhānyenābhivyaktā vyabhicāriṇo devamunigurunṛpādivaṣayā ca ratirudbuddhamātrā vibhāvādibhiraparipuṣṭatayā rasarūpatāmanāpadyamānāśca sthāyino bhāvā bhāvaśabdavācyāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4741: evaṃ pradhānamapi raso nirākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyasya bhāvasya pradhānasya anuga ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4742: udvuddhamātrā ityādikaṃ sthāyino bhāvā ityasya viśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa03cu:4743: teṣāṃ rasatānāptau hetuḥ vibhāvādiriti, tairaparipoṣaśca tasya viśiṣyāniścitatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:4758: “divi vā bhuvi vā mamāstu vāso narake vā narakāntaka ! prakāmam /
GK16visa03cu:4762: (vi, ca) divi vā bhuvi veti---he narakāsurāntaka maraṇe jāte mama divi bhuvi vā narake vā vāso 'stu /
GK16visa03cu:4765: tadā ca divi vā ityādikam asambaddhaṃ syāt /
GK16visa03cu:4771: tathāpi śuśraṣurahaṃ garīyasīrgiro 'thavā śreyasi kena tṛpyate” //
GK16visa03cu:4776: he mune tava amunā vilokanenaiva kṛtārthaḥ kato 'smi /
GK16visa03cu:4778: nabarhitaṃ nāśitam aṃhaḥ pāpaṃ yena tādṛśena /
GK16visa03cu:4779: tathāpi tava garīyasīḥ giraḥ śuśrūṣuḥ śrotu micthurammi /
GK16visa03cu:4781: kena janena śreyasi maṅgale tṛpyate; api tu na kenāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4785: na dhatte śirasā gaṅgāṃ bhūribhārabhiyā haraḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4789: tava vājirājyā nirdhūtaṃ yad dhūlipaṭalaṃ tena paṅkilām /
GK16visa03cu:4805: kandarpeṇa dhanuṣi āropite ākālike vasante jāte tapasyato maheśasya pārvatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃcid dhairyyaparāvṛttivarṇanamidam /
GK16visa03cu:4808: dhairyyaparāvṛtteḥ kiñcid udbhāvena rasatāmanāptatvena bhāvatvasyaiva prāpterityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4810: (lo, o) ratirityanantaraṃ paripoṣaṃ na nīteti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4816: (vi, ña) saṃcāriṇaḥ pradhānāni ityanena pradhānībhūtasyaiva vyabhicāribhāvasya bhāvatvaprāptiruktā
GK16visa03cu:4837: anaucityaṃ cātra rasānāṃ bhāratādipraṇītalakṣaṇānāṃ sāmagrīrahitatve ekadeśayogitvopalakṣaṇaparaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:4846: tallakṣaṇākteṃ yat kiñcid sattve ekadeśayogitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4875: evamuttarottaraṃ gataparaṃ kvacit tadviṣayaparaṃ kvacit tadviśiṣṭaparaṃ yogyatayā bodhyam
GK16visa03cu:4878: “svāmī mugdhataro vanaṃ ghanamidaṃ bālāhamekākinī kṣoṇīmāvṛṇute tamālamalinacchāyā tamaḥ santatiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4879: tanme sundara ! muñca, kṛṣṇa ! sahasā vartmeti gopyā giraḥ śrutvā tāṃ
GK16visa03cu:4883: (vi, ḍha) sandhyākāle panthānamāvṛtya tiṣṭhantaṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ prati gopyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4886: tathā hi mugdhataro mūḍhataro mama tava āsaṅgaṃ tarkayitumasamarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4889: tatra gurupatnīgatatve yathā--- madhau prabhūte pikanādadūte
GK16visa03cu:4894: pracumbati muhurmuhuḥ kucanipīḍamāliṅgati smitottaramudīkṣate parihasatyajastraṃ priyām //
GK16visa03cu:4897: iha hi svāmīti mughdhatara iti ca padābhyāṃ bhayadatvaṃ pakṣe priyatvābhāvo ratināgaratvābhāvaśca, vanasya ghanatve gṛhagamanadurghaṭatvam , bālye bhayaṃ yovanaṃ ca, yauvanena yauvanena ca
GK16visa03cu:4898: etādṛśi vayasi anurūpapatirnāsti, ekākinītyanena andhakārāvarāṇakathanena ca svairayānāsahatvaṃ gopyarasaprakāśābhāvaśca, sundareti sambodhane parityāgarthaṃ cāṭuḥ, svābhilaṣaṇīyatvañca locanī samāptā /
GK16visa03cu:4901: “kāntāsta eva bhuvanatritaye 'pi manye yeṣāṃ kṛte sutanu ! pāṇaḍurayaṃ
GK16visa03cu:4917: avacitya girau puro niṣaṇṇā svakacānutkacayāñcakāra bhartrā” //
GK16visa03cu:4920: (vi, ta) jaghanasthaleti---kāpi bhillī kirātī jaghanasthale naddhā dhṛtā patravalliḥ patralatā yathā sā tathā /
GK16visa03cu:4921: girimallīkusumāni kuṭajapuṣpāṇi avacitya girau puro niṣaṇṇā satī bhartrā svaprayojyena svakacān arthādavacitakusumaiḥ utkacayāñcakāra uddīptāṃścakāretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4923: atra ca valli ityatra hrasvāntavalliśabdasya rūpam /
GK16visa03cu:4935: cañcadvipañcīkalanādabhaṅgīsaṅgītaṃ cañcantyā vipañcyā vīṇāyāḥ kalanādabhaṅgyā saṅgītam /
GK16visa03cu:4939: “raktotphullaviśālalolanayanaḥ kampottarāṅgo muhur- muktvā karṇamapetabhīrdhṛ tadhanurbāṇo hareḥ paśyataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4945: atra ca tāpasasya jīmūtavāhanasya nṛpasya malayavatyāṃ ratau bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:4948: kupitor'junaḥ yudhyamānaṃ karṇaṃ tyaktvā yudhiṣṭhiraṃ hantuṃ pravṛttaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4953: hīnaniṣṭhe śānte gurvādyālambane hāsye brahmavadhādyutsāhe 'dhamapātragate vīre ca nodāhṛtam
GK16visa03cu:4954: krameṇa yathā caṇḍālayonāviha janma labdhaṃ dvijātijanmāpi na kāṅkṣitaṃ me /
GK16visa03cu:4955: puṇye vane kkāpi vapurvihāsyan punarbhavacchedamahaṃ samīhe // 1 //
GK16visa03cu:4957: adhyāpayatveṣa guruḥ sadā me lālāktavaktro maladigdhavāsāḥ // 2 //
GK16visa03cu:4960: naredraputrān mṛgayā pravṛttān viddhaṃ mṛgaṃ netumupāttavegāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4961: amī kirātāḥ śarapūrṇacāpā dhāvanti matvā tṛṇavattameva // 4 //
GK16visa03cu:4969: darśana soḍhumaśaknuvan bibhyat hemādriguhāṃ praviśya dināni nināya /
GK16visa03cu:4972: tathā hi kauśikaḥ pecakaḥ sahastraraśmerdarśanaṃ soḍhumaśaknuvan adriguhāṃ praviśya yathā dināni nayati, adhīrabuddhiralocano divāndhatvāt,
GK16visa03cu:4973: tathā ca pecaka iva indra ityupamādhvaniḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4977: atra śloke bhayasya sthāyibhāvasya bibhyadiyetadvācyatvāt vyaṅgyatvameva nāsti, kathaṃ vyaṅgyakramāparicayādhīnamasaṃlakṣyakamavyaṅgyatvam atoyaṃ na
GK16visa03cu:4979: tadudāharaṇaṃ tu jātiduṣṭo 'pi saṃślāghyaḥ sa kālayavano nṛpaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4984: bhāvābhāso lajjādike tu veśyādiviṣaye syāt // VisSd_3.266 //
GK16visa03cu:4988: veśyādiniṣṭhe yathā--- līlānamramukhī śiroṃ'śukamavākṛṣyānayantī puro netropāntavilokanena parito yūnāṃ dhayantī manaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4989: dṛṣṭā vāravilāsinī nanu sakhe ! kasyāpi puṇyātmanaḥ puṇyaughaṃ
GK16visa03cu:5003: bhāvasya śāntirudayaḥ saṃdhiḥ śabalatā matā // VisSd_3.267 //
GK16visa03cu:5005: “sutanu ! jahihi kopaṃ paśya pādānataṃ māṃ na khalu tava kadācitkopa
GK16visa03cu:5007: iti nigadati nāthe tiryagāmīlitākṣyā nayanajalamanalpaṃ muktamuktaṃ na
GK16visa03cu:5011: vrajati ramaṇo niḥ śvasyoccau stanasthitahastayā nayanasalilacchannā dṛṣṭiḥ sakhīṣu niveśitā”
GK16visa03cu:5019: rūpamidaṃ madirākṣyā madayati hṛdayaṃ dunoti came” //
GK16visa03cu:5021: “kvākāryaṃ , śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulaṃ, bhūyo 'pi dṛśyante sā, doṣāṇāṃ praśamāya me śrutamaho, kope 'pi kāntaṃ mukham /
GK16visa03cu:5022: kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalmaṣā kṛtadhiyaḥ, svapne 'pi sā durlabhā cetaḥ
GK16visa03cu:5023: svāsthyamupaihi, kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ dhāsyati” //
GK16visa03cu:5040: iti sāhityadarpaṇe rasādinirūpaṇo nāma tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ /
